Title: Forty Four Sri Lankans in different jails across the UAE pardoned by a Royal order
Summary: Forty-four Sri Lankans held in various jails across the UAE have been granted clemency through a Royal order. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the United Arab Emirates has officially informed the Sri Lankan Embassy about the pardons.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka Celebrates Christmas with the Sri Lankan Community in China
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Beijing celebrated Christmas at its Chancery premises, uniting the Sri Lankan community, students, Chinese well-wishers, and friends of Sri Lanka. The event brought together people to mark the festive occasion and strengthen cultural ties.

Title: Antwerp Governor Commends Sri Lanka’s Initiatives to Tackle Climate Change
Summary: Antwerp Governor Cathy Berx praised Sri Lanka's climate change initiatives during a discussion with Sri Lankan Ambassador Grace Asirwatham in the European Union. Both parties discussed their respective efforts to combat climate change.

Title: “The Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka meets winner of the reality show “Sa. Re. Ga. Ma. Pa li’l champs 2023”
Summary: The winner of the reality show "Sa. Re. Ga. Ma. Pa li'l champs 2023," Kilmisha Udhayaseelan, met with the Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka, Dr. D. Venkateshwaran, upon his invitation. The meeting took place following Kilmisha's victory on Zee Tamil TV.

Title: Sri Lankan Community in Belgium and Luxembourg Comes Together to Bid Farewell to Ambassador Grace Asirwatham
Summary: The Sri Lankan community in Belgium and Luxembourg gathered in Brussels to bid farewell to Ambassador Grace Asirwatham as she concludes her term as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Belgium and Luxembourg. The event was a heartfelt tribute to her service and contributions.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organizes Christmas Celebrations
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain, along with the Sri Lankan Catholic Community, organized a Christmas celebration on December 22, 2023, at the Embassy premises. The event began with a prayer, bringing together the community to mark the festive occasion.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Kuala Lumpur hosts Christmas Carols
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Kuala Lumpur hosted a Christmas Programme on 21 December 2023, signaling the start of the festive season. The event took place at the High Commission premises, featuring Christmas carols and celebrations.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Dubai and Northern Emirates Celebrates Christmas with Sri Lankan Migrant Workers at Safe House
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Dubai and Northern Emirates, along with "Serve the City" volunteers and the Catholic Church in Dubai, celebrated Christmas with Sri Lankan migrant workers at a Safe House. The event aimed to spread the true spirit of Christmas and bring joy to the migrant community.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Thailand discusses on gaining access to the Thai market for Sri Lankan fruits with the Deputy Director-General of the Department of Agriculture
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Thailand, C.A. Chaminda I. Colonne, met with Dr. Pongthai Thaiyothi, Deputy Director-General of the Department of Agriculture, to explore opportunities for Sri Lankan fruits to enter the Thai market. The discussion aimed to enhance trade relations between the two countries.

Title: URGENT IN-KIND MEDICINE FROM HEART TO HEART INTERNATIONAL UNITED STATES TO THE PEOPLE OF SRI LANKA
Summary: Heart to Heart International, based in the United States, is providing urgently needed in-kind medicine to the people of Sri Lanka. This initiative is under the direction of His Excellency Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe, as announced in a joint press release by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in Maldives organizes a Business Networking event
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Maldives hosted a successful Business Networking lunch at the "Indian Summer" in Hulhumale, a franchise restaurant owned by a Sri Lankan company, on December 21. The event aimed to facilitate business connections and collaboration among attendees.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage participates in the International Forum “People’s Diplomacy   as a Soft Power Tool to Promote International Cooperation”
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage participated as a key speaker in the International Forum on "People’s Diplomacy as a Soft Power Tool to Promote International Cooperation." The event focused on utilizing people's diplomacy as a soft power tool for enhancing international cooperation.

Title: United Nations Economic Commission for Africa hails Sri Lanka’s robust policies of Blue and Green Economy
Summary: The United Nations Economic Commission for Africa praises Sri Lanka for its strong policies promoting the Blue and Green Economy. The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Ethiopia and the African Union played a key role in this recognition.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran participates in a United Nations Art Exhibition
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran took part in the "Humanity, Solidarity, and One Planet" art exhibition at the Niavaran Cultural-Historic Complex in Tehran from December 7 to 17, 2023. The event showcased diverse artworks promoting themes of global unity and cooperation.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrates Christmas 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrated Christmas on December 12, 2023, at the Chancery premises. The Embassy honors important religious events of all four major religions observed in Sri Lanka, including Buddhism. The celebration was a festive occasion showcasing cultural diversity and unity.

Title: Minister of Tourism and Sport of Thailand assures to promote Buddhist Tourism and two-way Tourism exchanges
Summary: The Minister of Tourism and Sport of Thailand, Sudawan Wangsuphakitkosol, met with the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Thailand, C.A. Chaminda I. Colonne, to discuss promoting Buddhist Tourism and enhancing two-way tourism exchanges. The meeting took place at the Ministry of Tourism and Sport.

Title: Ambassador Janitha A. Liyanage meets Head of the Republic of Kalmykia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia, Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, met with the Head of the Republic of Kalmykia, Batu Khasikov, and a delegation on December 14, 2023. They discussed potential areas for cooperation during the meeting.

Title: High Commissioner-designate Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratna (Rtd.) Presents Credentials to the President of Pakistan
Summary: Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratna (Rtd.), the newly appointed High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Pakistan, presented his credentials to President Dr. Arif Alvi.

Title: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe met the Chief Executive Officer of Development Finance Corporation
Summary: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe met with the CEO of the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC), Scott Nathan, on December 8, 2023. During the meeting, Ambassador Samarasinghe expressed gratitude to the CEO for the financial support offered.

Title: Sri Lanka’s perspectives on the EU’s Indo-Pacific cooperation strategy discussed in Brussels
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador Grace Asirwatham discussed the EU's Indo-Pacific cooperation strategy in Brussels with Niclas Kvarns, Managing Director for Asia and Pacific at the EEAS. The meeting aimed to exchange perspectives on the strategic initiative.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi Celebrates Christmas
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi, in partnership with the Sri Lankan Catholic community in the UAE, marked Christmas on December 14, 2023, at St. Joseph's Cathedral in Abu Dhabi. The celebration included an evening of prayers and festivities.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Amman Commemorates International Migrants Day with   Sri Lankan Migrant Workers in Jordan
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Amman celebrated International Migrants Day on December 18, 2023, with Sri Lankan migrant workers in Jordan. The ceremony started with the National Anthem. It aimed to honor and recognize the contributions of migrant workers.

Title: Speaker of the Parliament Visits India
Summary: The Speaker of the Sri Lanka Parliament, Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana, led a 16-member multiparty delegation on a visit to India from December 16 to 20. The visit was at the invitation of Om Birla, the Speaker of the Lok Sabha of the Indian Parliament.

Title: Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta together with MIWA Pattern donates items for the development of   Dharmaraja School in Trincomalee
Summary: The Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta, in collaboration with MIWA Pattern, a clothing designer company led by Mira Hoeng, donated items to support the development of Dharmaraja School in Trincomalee. This initiative aims to enhance the school's resources and facilities for the benefit of its students.

Title: Minister of Education of Sri Lanka visits Indian Institute of Technology Madras in Chennai
Summary: The Minister of Education of Sri Lanka visited the Indian Institute of Technology Madras in Chennai. This visit aligns with President Ranil Wickremesinghe's vision to establish IIT-Madras's presence in Sri Lanka. The Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Southern India, Dr. D. Venkates, accompanied the Minister during the visit.

Title: “Meeting with the Deputy Managing Director of CHEC Port City Colombo”
Summary: Deputy Managing Director of CHEC Port City Colombo [Pvt.] Ltd Thulci Aluwihare met with the Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Southern India, Dr. D. Venkateshwaran, and the Minister of Commerce. The meeting aimed to discuss collaboration and strengthen ties between the organizations.

Title: International Migrants Day celebrated in Maldives
Summary: The International Migrants Day was celebrated in Maldives at a function organized by the Sri Lanka High Commission in Malé on December 18, 2023. The event took place at the Mission premises and was well-attended.

Title: International Peoples’ Diplomacy Event in Russia Commences in Accordance with Sri Lankan Traditions
Summary: The International New Year’s Event of People's Diplomacy, following Sri Lankan traditions, commenced in Russia on December 11, 2023. The celebration brought together diplomatic corps, Russian officials, and professionals to promote international cooperation and understanding.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the JCCI SME Exhibition in Johannesburg
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the JCCI SME Exhibition in Johannesburg with support from the High Commission of Sri Lanka in Pretoria, the Johannesburg Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Basilar Tea South Africa, and TnS Foods. The event showcased Ceylon Tea and other Sri Lankan products.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka participates in Bahrain National Day Celebrations
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka took part in the Cultural Show and Exhibition at the 52nd National Day Celebration of Bahrain, organized by "This is Bahrain" under the patronage of His Majesty K. The event showcased cultural exchange and strengthened ties between the two nations.

Title: Bahrain National Day Celebrations in Sri Lanka
Summary: The first-ever Bahrain National Day Celebration in Sri Lanka was organized by the Sri Lanka Club Alumni in association with the Sri Lanka Club Bahrain. The event took place at the Jet Wing Colombo Seven Hotel on 16 December 2023. It was a significant gathering to commemorate Bahrain's National Day.

Title: Sturle Harald Pedersen appointed as the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Bergen, Norway
Summary: Sturle Harald Pedersen has been appointed as the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Bergen, Norway, with jurisdiction in Vestland fylke. The appointment was issued by Foreign Minister Ali Sabry.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta Promotes Spectacular Tourism and Culinary Delights
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta hosted a tourism and culinary promotional event on December 14, 2023, highlighting Sri Lanka's tourist destinations and culinary offerings. The event attracted food enthusiasts and showcased the country's spectacular attractions.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Free Visa Regime to Chinese tourists announced at a colorful event in Beijing
Summary: Sri Lanka's Embassy in Beijing held a promotional event on December 15, 2023, to announce the Free Visa Regime for Chinese tourists, among 7 countries. The event attracted over 60 guests and highlighted the new visa policy.

Title: Sri Lanka Showcases Organic Excellence at the Middle East Organic and Natural Product Expo 2023 in Dubai
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased its organic excellence at the Middle East Organic and Natural Product Expo 2023 in Dubai, organized by the Consulate General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and Northern Emirates in collaboration with the Export Development Board of Sri Lanka (EDB). The event highlighted Sri Lanka's participation in promoting organic products in the Middle East region.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Ankara participates in the Annual Charity Bazaar organized by DMEDD
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara took part in the Annual Charity Bazaar organized by DMEDD and SHOM on the 10th. The event was held by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Spouses Solidarity Association of Türkiye.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism promoted in Riyadh
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Riyadh organized a tourism promotional event on December 13, 2023, as part of the Economic Diplomacy Program of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Sri Lanka. The event aimed to promote Sri Lanka's tourism sector and attract visitors from Riyadh.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador Presents Credentials to the President of Nepal
Summary: Sri Lanka's new Ambassador to Nepal, Air Chief Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana (Retd), presented his credentials to Nepalese President Ramchandra Paudel at the Office of the President in Kathmandu.

Title: High Commissioner Bogollagama meets with UK Prime Minister’s Trade Envoy for Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to the United Kingdom, Rohitha Bogollagama, met with UK Prime Minister’s Trade Envoy for Sri Lanka, Lord Davies of Abersoch CBE, on December 14, 2023, at Devonshire House in Mayfair, London. The meeting aimed to discuss trade relations between the two countries.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne participates in the Lankan Fest 2023
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne participated in the Lankan Fest 2023, featuring Sri Lanka's culture and cuisine. Their stall at the event was successful, showcasing the country's rich heritage. The opening ceremony of the festival was marked by a special event.

Title: Strengthening Belgium-Sri Lanka Parliamentary Ties Discussed in Brussels
Summary: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador to Belgium, Grace Asirwatham, discussed strengthening parliamentary ties with President of the Belgium-Sri Lanka Parliamentary Friendship Group, Senator Allessia Claes, on December 14, 2023, at the Belgium Senate building in Brussels. The meeting aimed to promote closer collaboration between the two countries' parliamentary bodies.

Title: Air Arabia launches direct flights from Abu Dhabi to Colombo
Summary: Air Arabia has launched its first direct flight from Abu Dhabi to Colombo, strengthening connectivity between Sri Lanka and the UAE. The low-cost carrier's new route aims to enhance travel options for passengers between the two destinations.

Title: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry requests his UAE counterpart to allocate a land to build a Buddhist temple in the UAE
Summary: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry has requested his UAE counterpart, Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, to allocate land in the UAE for the construction of an International Buddhist Temple. This request aims to benefit the Buddhist community in the region.

Title: High Commissioner Rohitha Bogollagama holds trade and economic discussions with Minister of State for Trade Policy
Summary: High Commissioner Rohitha Bogollagama of Sri Lanka met with Minister of State for Trade Policy and Minister for London Greg Hands on December 12, 2023, at the Department for Business and Trade in the UK. They engaged in discussions on trade and economic matters during the meeting.

Title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Belgium bids adieu to Ambassador Asirwatham
Summary: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Belgium bid farewell to Sri Lanka's Ambassador Grace Asirwatham on December 13, 2023. The event marked her departure as Ambassador to Belgium, Luxembourg, and Head of Mission to the European Union.

Title: 08th Round of Sri Lanka-Thailand Free Trade Agreement Negotiations was successfully concluded in Bangkok
Summary: The 8th Round of Sri Lanka-Thailand Free Trade Agreement (SLTFTA) Negotiations successfully concluded in Bangkok, Thailand from 27-29 November. The negotiations were co-chaired by the Director General of the Department of Trade.

Title: High Commissioner Bogollagama meets with members of the Association of Professional Sri Lankans in the United Kingdom
Summary: High Commissioner Rohitha Bogollagama met with members of the Association of Professional Sri Lankans in the United Kingdom (APSL, UK) at the High Commission on December 11, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss matters of mutual interest and strengthen ties between the two parties.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels hosts Christmas Carols
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels hosted a Christmas Carol event at the Sri Lanka Residence on December 10, 2023, to kick off the festive season. The event brought together attendees to celebrate the holiday spirit through music and camaraderie.

Title: Sri Lanka Shines Bright at Vietnam Expo 2023: Innovative Approach for Future Collaboration
Summary: Sri Lanka showcased its innovative approach for future collaboration at Vietnam Expo 2023 with the support of the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Vietnam and the Export Development Board (EDB). The event, held from December 7 to 9, featured the participation of Sri Lankan businesses, fostering potential partnerships and opportunities for both countries.

Title: St. Bridget’s Convent wins under 17 Netball Championship at Pathumthani University   Sport Tournament Thailand 2023
Summary: St. Bridget’s Convent in Colombo emerged victorious in the under 17 Netball Championship at the Pathumthani University Sport Tournament in Thailand 2023. The tournament, held from 28 November to 01 December 2023 at Samkhok School Pathumthani, saw 58 students from St. Bridget’s Convent competing against Thai students.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain Organizes an Awareness Programme for Sri Lankan Community   Representatives on Business Opportunities with Bahrain
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Manama, in collaboration with Export Bahrain and the Ministry of Industry and Commerce of Bahrain, conducted an awareness program for Sri Lankan business representatives on potential business opportunities in Bahrain. The program aimed to provide valuable insights and foster connections between the Sri Lankan community and Bahrain's business sector.

Title: FAM Tour of Bangladeshi Tour Operators Strengthens Tourism Cooperation
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Dhaka, with the support of the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB), arranged a Familiarization (FAM) tour for six selected tour operators from Bangladesh. This initiative aimed to strengthen tourism cooperation between the two countries, fostering better understanding and collaboration in the industry.

Title: Sri Lankan Buddhist Monks attend the 25th Anniversary of International Theravada Buddhist Missionary University in Myanmar
Summary: Sri Lankan Buddhist monks, led by Most Venerable Karagoda Uyangoda Maithri Murthi Maha Nayaka Thero of Amarapura Nikaya, attended the 25th Anniversary Silver Jubilee ceremony of the International Theravada Buddhist Missionary University in Myanmar. The delegation participated in the event to commemorate the university's milestone and strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Luxembourg Foreign Ministry bids farewell to Ambassador Asirwatham
Summary: Luxembourg's Foreign Ministry bid farewell to Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Belgium, Luxembourg, and Head of Mission to the European Union, Grace Asirwatham. Asirwatham paid a farewell call on the Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign and European Affairs of Luxembourg.

Title: High Commissioner Rohitha Bogollagama Attends Sangha Nayaka Anuprapthi Felicitation Ceremony of Ven. Pidiwille Piyatissa Nayaka Thero in Manchester
Summary: High Commissioner Rohitha Bogollagama attended the Sangha Nayaka Anuprapthi Felicitation Ceremony of Ven. Pidiwille Piyatissa Nayaka Thero in Manchester on December 10, 2021. The event was held to honor Ven. Pidiwille Piyatissa Nayaka Thero for his contributions.

Title: Sri Lankan culture and cuisine at the forefront of the UNWG International Festival Charity Bazaar 2023 in Vienna, Austria
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Austria showcased Sri Lankan culture and cuisine at the 54th International Festival Charity Bazaar 2023 in Vienna, organized by the United Nations Women’s Guild (UNWG) on December 9, 2023. The event highlighted Sri Lanka's rich cultural heritage and culinary delights to attendees in Vienna.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bucharest participates in the “IWA Christmas Charity Bazaar” – 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bucharest took part in the "IWA Christmas Charity Bazaar" organized by the International Association of Women (IWA) with the patronage of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bangkok Launches New Official Website
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bangkok has launched its new official website, including the Permanent Mission to the UNESCAP, on December 6, 2023. The Deputy Permanent Secretary of the Ministry was present during the launch event.

Title: Sri Lanka reaffirms significant pledges for UN Peacekeeping Operations
Summary: Sri Lanka reaffirmed significant pledges for UN Peacekeeping Operations at the 2023 United Nations Peacekeeping Ministerial in Accra, Ghana. Rohitha Bogollagama, Special Representative/Envoy of President Ranil Wickremesinghe, led the Sri Lanka delegation during the event.

Title: Sri Lanka delivers the keynote speech at 5th Asia-Pacific Directors General Forum for South-South and Triangular Cooperation on 27 November 2023 at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific, Bangkok
Summary: Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Sri Lanka to the United Nations in New York, Mohan Pieris, delivered the keynote speech at the 5th Asia-Pacific Directors General Forum for South-South and Triangular Cooperation held on 27 November 2023 at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific in Bangkok.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat launches new official website
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat launched its new official website, www.oman.embassy.gov.lk, during the Deepavali Celebrations at the Ambassador's Residence on 25 November 2023. The website aims to provide updated information and services to visitors.

Title: Sri Lanka Export Products Promoted at “ASIA DAY-2023” in Austria
Summary: Sri Lanka Export Products were promoted at "ASIA DAY-2023" in Austria by the Embassy & Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka. The event, organized by the Austrian Federal Economic Chamber (WKO), took place on 5 December 2023 at the WKO Headquarters.

Title: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner Dharmapala Weerakkody presents Credentials to the President of Bangladesh
Summary: Sri Lanka's new High Commissioner in Dhaka, Dharmapala Weerakkody, presented his Letters of Credence to President Mohammed Shahabuddin of Bangladesh at the Bangabhaban in Dhaka on Thursday. This formal presentation marks the official beginning of his diplomatic duties in Bangladesh.

Title: Celebrating 75 years of diplomatic relations, Sri Lanka and Türkiye issue special commemorative stamps
Summary: To mark the 75th Anniversary of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and Türkiye in 2023, special commemorative stamps have been issued by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara in collaboration with the Turkish Post. The stamps aim to celebrate this milestone in the longstanding relationship between the two countries.

Title: “Visit Sri Lanka!”  Tourism Promotion networking event in Canberra
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Canberra, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, hosted a lively evening reception for outbound tour operators in Canberra on December 6. The event aimed to promote tourism in Sri Lanka.

Title: Meeting with members of India Business Group
Summary: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai Dr. Valsan Vethody and Consul (Commercial) Shirani Ariyarathne recently held an interactive session with the President and other members of the India Business Group in Mumbai. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties and foster collaboration between the two business communities.

Title: President of the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) receives Ambassador Asirwatham for a farewell conversation
Summary: Ambassador Grace Asirwatham visited President Koen Lenaerts of the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) on December 7, 2023, at the Court premises in Luxembourg for a farewell conversation. This marked the conclusion of her term as ambassador to Belgium.

Title: Sri Lanka Discusses Trade and Economic Cooperation with Belarus National Marketing Center
Summary: State Minister of Foreign Affairs Tharaka Balasuriya and Sri Lankan Ambassador to Russia Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage held a virtual meeting on 30 November 2023 to discuss trade and economic cooperation with Belarus. The discussions focused on strengthening ties between the two countries in these areas.

Title: High Commissioner-designate Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratne (Rtd.) Presents Open Copy of Letter of Credence
Summary: High Commissioner-designate Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratne (Rtd.) of Sri Lanka presented the Open Copy of his Letter of Credence to Chief of State Protocol Tipu Usman at the Pakistan office. This formal presentation signifies the beginning of his diplomatic role in Pakistan.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka in Russia strengthens links with Nizhny Novgorod
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia, Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, strengthened ties with Nizhny Novgorod by meeting Governor Gleb Nikitin at the International Forum "SO.KNOWLEDGE." The meeting aimed to enhance cooperation between Sri Lanka and Nizhny Novgorod.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia addresses MGIMO University students
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia, Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, delivered a lecture at MGIMO University during South Asia Week. The event was part of an invitation from the Moscow State Institute of International Relations.

Title: Eurojust President Ladislav Hamran and Ambassador Asirwatham Engage in a farewell meeting in The Hague
Summary: Eurojust President Ladislav Hamran bid farewell to Ambassador Grace Asirwatham, Head of Mission of Sri Lanka to the EU, in The Hague, Netherlands, on December 6, 2023. The meeting marked the conclusion of Ambassador Asirwatham's term in Brussels.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Muscat participates in the Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Muscat recently took part in the Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023 organized by the Omani Foreign Ministry at the Diplomatic Club. The event saw the participation of diplomats from various countries, promoting charitable causes.

Title: High Commissioner-designate of Sri Lanka to Pakistan  Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratne (Rtd.) assumes duties
Summary: Admiral Ravindra Chandrasiri Wijegunaratne (Rtd.) has assumed duties as the High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Pakistan. He officially began his role at the Sri Lanka High Commission in Islamabad.

Title: Sri Lankan Food, Tea and Tourism Showcased at Brooklyn Mall in Pretoria
Summary: Sri Lankan food, tea, and tourism were recently showcased at the Brooklyn Mall in Pretoria by the High Commission of Sri Lanka in South Africa. The Sri Lankan stall, themed "Taste of Sri Lanka," attracted visitors to experience the country's culinary delights and tourism offerings.

Title: Ceylon Cinnamon – the True Cinnamon- showcased in Stockholm
Summary: Ceylon Cinnamon, known as the true cinnamon, was recently showcased in Stockholm by chefs in Sweden, Swedish food industry representatives, and Sri Lanka's Ceylon Cinnamon brands. The event, organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Sweden, highlighted the island's renowned spice to a wider audience.

Title: More Polish Charter flights to Sri Lanka in Winter Season as LOT Polish Airlines 2024-2028 Strategy identifies Sri Lanka among  profitable Asian destinations
Summary: Polish visitors to Sri Lanka are expected to increase this Winter/Spring season with more direct charter flights from Warsaw and other Polish cities to Colombo and Mattala airports. LOT Polish Airlines' 2024-2028 strategy has identified Sri Lanka as a profitable Asian destination, leading to more flights to the country.

Title: Employment opportunities for Sri Lankans in Japan – Conducting examinations in Construction Skills Test under Specified Skilled Worker (SSW) Programme of Japan, launched in Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka has launched examinations for the Construction Skills Test under Japan's Specified Skilled Worker (SSW) Programme, offering employment opportunities for Sri Lankans. This initiative, started on December 1st, marks a significant step in facilitating new job prospects in Japan for skilled workers from Sri Lanka.

Title: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai invited as Guest of Honor and Keynote speaker at Government Law College
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai, Valsan Vethody, was invited as the Guest of Honor and Keynote speaker at the inauguration of the Government Law College's "Model United Nations" seminar. The event took place over two days, showcasing the Consul General's participation and support.

Title: Ambassador Samarasinghe addresses the new Peace Corps Volunteer cohort for Sri Lanka
Summary: On November 30, 2023, Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe of Sri Lanka addressed the inaugural cohort of Peace Corps Volunteers set to depart for Sri Lanka on December 1, 2023. The volunteers received guidance and encouragement from the Ambassador as they prepared for their upcoming mission.

Title: The Consul General attends the Award Night of Markham Cricket Academy
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, Thushara Rodrigo, attended the 15th Anniversary celebration and Awards Night 2023 of the Markham Cricket Academy in Markham. The event was held at the invitation of the academy.

Title: Brazil is Keen to Boost Trade and Economic Relations with Sri Lanka
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Brazil, Sumith Dassanayake, visited Sao Paulo, Brazil's Trade and Economic hub, from November 27 to 30, 2023, to enhance trade and economic relations between the two countries. During the visit, Ambassador Dassanayake focused on strengthening ties and exploring opportunities for increased cooperation. Brazil is eager to boost trade and economic relations with Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka and Chile commemorate Chilean Poet Pablo Neruda
Summary: Sri Lanka and Chile commemorate the 50th death anniversary of Chilean poet Pablo Neruda, who was also the first Chilean Consul to Ceylon. The event was organized by the High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi.

Title: ​Sri Lanka Embassy celebrates the many facets of France-Sri Lanka friendship in vibrant 75th anniversary reception in Paris
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Paris marked the 75th anniversary of diplomatic ties between Sri Lanka and France with a lively reception on October 31, 2023. The event, attended by French dignitaries and friends of Sri Lanka, celebrated the enduring friendship between the two nations.

Title: High Commissioner -designate of Sri Lanka to the Republic of India Kshenuka Senewiratne assumes duties
Summary: Kshenuka Senewiratne, the High Commissioner-designate of Sri Lanka to the Republic of India, officially started her duties at the High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi on December 4, 2023, after a multi-religious ceremony.

Title: Relations between Sri Lanka and the EU reviewed in Brussels
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to the European Union, Grace Asirwatham, concluded her tenure in Brussels with a farewell meeting with Paola Pampaloni, Deputy Managing Director. The meeting aimed to review the relations between Sri Lanka and the EU.

Title: Sri Lanka successfully participates at the 68th YWCA Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023 in Bangkok
Summary: Sri Lanka successfully participated in the 68th YWCA Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023 in Bangkok. The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka collaborated with various organizations including the National Crafts Council and the Export Development Board. The event showcased Sri Lankan crafts and products to an international audience, promoting the country's cultural and economic offerings.

Title: Sri Lankan Ambassador Visits the ECO Secretariat in Tehran
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu visited the Economic Cooperation Organization (ECO) Secretariat in Tehran on November 26, 2023. The purpose of his visit was to strengthen ties and discuss cooperation between Sri Lanka and the ECO.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka celebrates Deepavali with the Sri Lankan community in Muscat
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat celebrated Deepavali 2023 with the Sri Lankan Hindu Community in Oman at the Ambassador's official Residence lawn on November 25. Around 100 community members participated in the event.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organizes a Community Awareness Session with the People’s Bank of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain hosted a Community Awareness Session on 21 November 2023, bringing together the Sri Lankan community in Bahrain and a delegation from the People’s Bank of Sri Lanka. The event aimed to facilitate dialogue and information sharing between the two groups, fostering stronger connections and financial literacy within the community.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Ethiopia participates in the Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023 in Ethiopia
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Ethiopia, along with the Sri Lankan community, participated in the Diplomatic Charity Bazaar 2023 organized by the Diplomatic Spouses Group in Ethiopia. The event aimed to support charitable causes and foster diplomatic relations in Ethiopia.

Title: High Commissioner-Designate of Sri Lanka to Bangladesh Dharmapala Weerakkody assumes duties
Summary: Dharmapala Weerakkody, the new High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Bangladesh, officially started his duties at the Sri Lanka High Commission in Dhaka on November 29, 2023. The ceremony marking the occasion was kept simple and dignified.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Milan conducts first-ever consular mobile service in Venice
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan conducted its first consular mobile service in Venice on 26 November 2023, fulfilling a request from Ven Weligama S. This initiative aimed to provide consular services to Sri Lankan citizens in Venice, enhancing accessibility and support for the community.

Title: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrates Diwali
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrated Diwali by organizing a religious Lakshmi Puja on Dhanteras, the auspicious day of the festival of lights, on November 10, 2023. The event was a part of the Diwali festivities, bringing together the community to mark the occasion.

Title: Diwali Celebration at the High Commission of Sri Lanka, Canberra
Summary: Sri Lanka High Commission in Canberra celebrated Diwali, the Festival of Lights, with Sri Lankan Hindu devotees and representatives of Sri Lankan Associations on the 24th. The event took place at the High Commission premises, bringing together the community to mark the festive occasion.

Title: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan celebrates Deepavali
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan celebrated Deepavali, also known as the festival of lights symbolizing the victory of good over evil. The event included the participation of members from the multi-ethnic and multicultural community.

Title: Bulgarian President seeks increased bilateral trade and tourism flows and multifaceted cooperation with Sri Lanka
Summary: Bulgarian President aims to boost bilateral trade, tourism, and cooperation with Sri Lanka. Ambassador Dhammika Kumari Semasinghe has been accredited as Sri Lanka’s Ambassador to Bulgaria with residence in Warsaw, Poland. This move signifies a strengthening of diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia pays a visit to the Rossotrudnichestvo office
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia, Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, visited the Rossotrudnichestvo office, which is the Federal Agency for the Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Compatriots Living Abroad, and International Humanitarian Cooperation.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Singapore celebrates Deepavali
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Singapore celebrated Deepavali, the "Festival of Lights," at the Sri Senpaga Vinayagar temple on 18 November 2023, with over 120 participants in attendance. The event was a joyous occasion that brought together community members to mark the festive celebration.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at the 7th Asian Pacific Population Conference in Bangkok, Thailand
Summary: Sri Lanka's delegation, led by Ambassador and Permanent Representative to UNESCAP Chaminda Colonne, participated in the 7th Asian Pacific Population Conference held from November 15 to 17, 2023, at the United Nations in Bangkok, Thailand.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Islamabad participates in the Pakistan Foreign Office Women’s Association (PFOWA) Annual Charity Bazaar – 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Islamabad participated in the Pakistan Foreign Office Women's Association (PFOWA) Annual Charity Bazaar - 2023 at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Pakistan on November 19, 2023. The event aimed to support charitable causes and promote collaboration between the two countries.

Title: The Consul General of Sri Lankan in Toronto participates CanLanka Business Association of Canada event
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, Thushara Rodrigo, recently participated as the Guest of Honour at a social event hosted by the CanLanka Business Association of Canada in Toronto. The event brought together the Sri Lankan Canadian Business Community for networking and collaboration opportunities.

Title: High Commissioner designate Rohitha Bogollagama presents open copy of Letter of Credence
Summary: High Commissioner designate Rohitha Bogollagama presented the Open Copy of his Letter of Credence to Victoria Busby OBE, Vice Marshal and Director of Protocol at the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office on the 23rd.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka, EDB, SLFLPMA Explores Collaboration with Yogyakarta ATK Polytechnic Indonesia for advancement in Leather Industry
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka, EDB, and SLFLPMA are exploring collaboration with Yogyakarta ATK Polytechnic in Indonesia to advance the leather industry. Director Sugiyanto and his team held productive discussions with the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta on November 20, 2023, with the aim of fostering this partnership.

Title: Celebrating 100th Anniversary of the Turkish Republic, Ambassador of Sri Lanka hosts “Music Life around Us”
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Turkey, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, hosted the 42nd Concert of "Music Life around Us" in celebration of the 100th Anniversary of the Turkish Republic. The event was held in solidarity with the establishment of the Republic of Turkey.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia and ASEAN, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage attends   the Diplomat Dialogue hosted by Jayabaya University
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia and ASEAN, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, was the keynote speaker at the inaugural Diplomat Dialogue hosted by Jayabaya University's International Relations Student Association (HIMA-HI) Faculty.

Title: Deputy High Commissioner Dr. D. Venkateshwaran meets with the Indian Chamber of Commerce &   Industry (ICCI) of Coimbatore
Summary: Deputy High Commissioner Dr. D. Venkateshwaran recently met with the Indian Chamber of Commerce & Industry (ICCI) in Coimbatore at their invitation. The meeting included discussions with Minister (Commerce) G. L. Gnanatheva, focusing on enhancing bilateral trade relations between Sri Lanka and South India.

Title: Ambassador M. R. K. Lenagala presents credentials in Austria
Summary: Ambassador M. R. K. Lenagala presented his Letters of Credence to the Federal President of Austria, Alexander Van der Bellen, officially accrediting him as the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage attends the Transport Week in Moscow
Summary: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage participated in the Transport Week in Moscow, which commenced on November 14, 2023, at Gostiny Dvor. The event featured conferences focusing on the advancement and operations of the automobile, aviation, and rail industries.

Title: Members of Andhra Pradesh Chamber of Commerce & Industry meet Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka
Summary: Members of the Andhra Pradesh Chamber of Commerce & Industry, including the President, met with Deputy High Commissioner Dr. D. Venkateshwaran at the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai. The meeting aimed to discuss business opportunities and investments between the two regions.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the Travel Expo Ankara 6th International Tourism and Travel Fair
Summary: Sri Lanka's Embassy in Ankara took part in the 6th Travel Expo Ankara 2023 at ATO Congresium in Turkey from November 16 to 19. The event was opened by the Deputy President of Turkey, showcasing international tourism and travel opportunities.

Title: High Commissioner – designate Rohitha Bogollagama assume​s duties
Summary: Rohitha Bogollagama, the High Commissioner designate of Sri Lanka to the United Kingdom, assumed his duties at the High Commission in London on 20 November 2023. He arrived in London on 19 November 2023 and participated in a simple ceremony to mark the occasion.

Title: President Wickremesinghe undertakes a successful official visit to Maldives
Summary: President Ranil Wickremesinghe successfully concluded a 2-day official visit to Maldives on 18 November. He attended the Inauguration ceremony of the newly elected President before returning to Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lankan Envoy Conducts Trade Talks With Colombia
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake conducted trade talks with Colombia during his official visit to Bogota. He visited the Bogota Chamber of Commerce headquarters for a meeting, aiming to strengthen bilateral trade relations between the two countries.

Title: The Deputy High Commission in Chennai celebrates Diwali
Summary: The Deputy High Commission of Sri Lanka in Chennai celebrated Diwali on November 10, 2023, with Sri Lankans residing in Chennai, as well as the Post staff and their families. The event took place at the Post premises, fostering a sense of community and cultural exchange among participants.

Title: High Commissioner-designate Rohitha Bogollagama arrives in London
Summary: High Commissioner-designate Rohitha Bogollagama arrived in London on 19 November 2023 to assume duties as Sri Lanka's representative to the United Kingdom. He was warmly received at London Heathrow Airport by the Special Representative.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta in collaboration with the SLTPB Welcomes Influencer Michael Prayogo to Showcase Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, in partnership with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB), welcomed Indonesian influencer Michael Prayogo to showcase Sri Lanka. The visit aimed to promote Sri Lanka as a tourist destination through Prayogo's social media presence.

Title: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto attends Celebration of Islamic History Month of Canada 2023
Summary: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, Thushara Rodrigo, was the guest of honor at the celebration of Islamic History Month of Canada 2023 in Toronto. The event was attended by the Sri Lankan Muslim Community in Canada.

Title: Mira Hoeng Unveils ‘Nil Manel: Blue Lotus’ Collection, Blending Artistry with Philanthropy
Summary: Renowned Indonesian textile artist Mira Hoeng unveiled her latest collection, "Nil Manel: Blue Lotus," on 02 November 2023. The collection, inspired by Sri Lanka's national flower, blends artistry with philanthropy, showcasing exquisite cloth designs.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa welcomes student delegation from University of Johannesburg
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa welcomed a student delegation from the University of Johannesburg as part of its cultural diplomacy programme. This marked the second program in the initiative, with the student delegation being led by a representative.

Title: Meetings in Sydney to Promote Sri Lanka-Australia Links
Summary: Sri Lanka High Commissioner in Australia Chitrangani Wagiswara met with New South Wales Minister Steve Kamper on November 7 to strengthen Sri Lanka-Australia ties. The meeting aimed to promote cooperation in multiculturalism, small business, lands, property, and sport.

Title: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake Presents Credentials to President of Colombia
Summary: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake, representing Sri Lanka in Brazil and Colombia, presented his credentials to Colombian President Gustavo F. This formalized his role as Ambassador to Colombia.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka Presents Credentials to President of the Republic of Cyprus
Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Italy, Jagath Wellawatte, presented his Letters of Credence to President Nikos Christodoulides of Cyprus. Wellawatte is concurrently accredited to Cyprus, strengthening diplomatic ties between the two nations.

Title: Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta participates in the Women’s International Club (WIC) Annual Charity Bazaar 2023
Summary: The Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta, along with Dilmah Indonesia, Miwa Patterns, and Ceylon cinnamon entrepreneurs, took part in the Women’s International Club (WIC) Annual Charity Bazaar 2023 at the Jaka. The event aimed to support charitable causes and promote collaboration among participants.

Title: “SO SRILANKA” Promotional Event at Wisma Putra Day 2023, Malaysia
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Kuala Lumpur showcased the "SO SRILANKA" pavilion at Wisma Putra Day 2023 in Malaysia on November 4, 2023. The event aimed to promote Sri Lanka's tourism and culture to visitors.

Title: Products of Sri Lankan SMEs enthrall and fascinate Vietnamese in Ha Noi
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam, along with the Industrial Development Board (IDB), hosted a "Sri Lankan Fair" in Ha Noi to showcase products from Sri Lankan SMEs to Vietnamese consumers. The event aimed to promote these entrepreneurs' products to the middle-income market in Vietnam.

Title: Consul General Requests Youth Wing of Sri Lankan Canadian Community to   Support Reconciliation Efforts in Sri Lanka
Summary: Consul General of Sri Lanka Thushara Rodrigo was invited as the Guest of Honour at a Sri Lankan cultural program organized by "Studio S," the youth wing of the Sri Lankan Canadian community at the Latvian Canadian Cultural Center. During the event, he requested the youth wing to support reconciliation efforts in Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka presents credentials to President of the Hellenic Republic
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador in Italy, Jagath Wellawatte, presented his Letters of Credence to the President of the Hellenic Republic, Katerina Sakellaropoulo, in Greece. Wellawatte is concurrently accredited to the Hellenic Republic.

Title: Consul General of Sri Lanka participates in the “Katina Ceremonies” of Toronto Maha Vihara and West End Buddhist Vihara and Meditation Center Toronto
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, Thushara Rodrigo, took part in the Katina Ceremonies at Toronto Maha Vihara and West End Buddhist Vihara and Meditation Center on November 4 and 5, 2023.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrates Deepavali
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrated Deepavali on November 9, 2023, at its premises. The religious rituals for Deepavali were conducted by Sri Lankan Kurukkal Swamy Sivasri Sivanatha, adding auspiciousness to the event.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels Showcases “Sri Lanka Odyssey” in Luxembourg
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels hosted a tourism promotion workshop called “Sri Lanka Odyssey: An Ultimate Experience of a Lifetime” in Luxembourg on November 8, 2023. The event aimed to showcase the beauty and attractions of Sri Lanka to the audience.

Title: Jetwing Travel is Expanding its Promotional Network to Jakarta, Indonesia
Summary: Jetwing Travel, in collaboration with the Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta and Sri Lankan Airlines, organized a Business to Business (B2B) Travel Agents Gathering to boost tourism promotion in Jakarta, Indonesia. The event aimed to strengthen ties with Indonesian tour operators and expand Jetwing Travel's promotional network in the region.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism showcased at World Travel Market in London
Summary: Sri Lanka Tourism was highlighted at the World Travel Market in London, a premier global event for the Travel and Tourism Trade, which started on November 6, 2023, at the Excel Exhibition Hall. The event aimed to promote international travel worldwide, showcasing Sri Lanka's tourism offerings.

Title: Sri Lanka Hosts First-Ever Mega Country Promotion in Milan
Summary: Sri Lanka hosted its first-ever 'Sri Lankan Festival in Milan' at Parco Sempione on October 28 and 29, 2023, with the support of the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan and the Municipal Council of Milan. The event aimed to promote Sri Lankan culture and tourism in Milan, marking a significant milestone in cultural exchange between the two countries.

Title: Canadian Network of Sri Lankan Academics (CaNSLA) Launched
Summary: The Canadian Network of Sri Lankan Academics (CaNSLA) was launched by academics of Sri Lankan descent residing in Canada through a virtual meeting. This chapter is affiliated with the Federation of Sri Lankan International Academic Network (F-SLIAN) and aims to connect and support Sri Lankan academics in Canada.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta organizes Sahabat Sri Lanka Programme
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta organized the Sahabat Sri Lanka (Friends of Sri Lanka) program on October 27, 2023, at the Embassy's premises. The event was attended by Indonesian youth aged 17-30 years, mostly international participants. The program aimed to foster cultural exchange and strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta Celebrates Deepavali
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta celebrated Deepavali, the Festival of Lights, on November 4, 2023, at the Embassy premises. The event was well-attended by representatives from the Hindu community in Indonesia, marking a joyous celebration of the festival.

Title: The Avium Wildlife Photography Exhibition and Launch of Tusker foundation held under the Patronage of High Commission of Sri Lanka in the UK
Summary: The Avium Wildlife Photography Exhibition and launch of the Tusker Foundation took place at the High Commission of Sri Lanka in the UK on November 1, 2023, with the patronage of the High Commission of Sri Lanka.

Title: State Minister of Finance Leads Sri Lanka Delegation to the 4th Session of the Committee on Macroeconomic Policy, Poverty Reduction and Financing for Development in Bangkok
Summary: State Minister of Finance Shehan Semasinghe led the Sri Lanka delegation to the 4th Session of the Committee on Macroeconomic Policy, Poverty Reduction, and Financing for Development in Bangkok. The delegation participated in discussions at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran Participates in Iran Charity Bazaar 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran took part in the Iran Charity Bazaar held from 01-03 November 2023. The event was organized by the Association of Women Diplomats of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Title: Newly appointed Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Haifa and Northern Israel receives   Commission of Appointment
Summary: Anat Bernstein Reich, the newly appointed Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Haifa and Northern Israel, received her Commission of Appointment. She also serves as the President of the Israel-Asia Chamber of Commerce and Chairperson.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Participation at World Trade Expo, Mumbai
Summary: Sri Lanka's participation at the World Trade Expo 2023 in Mumbai was organized by the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai and the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce from 3 to 4 October 2023. The Expo was a joint effort to showcase Sri Lanka's presence and offerings at the event.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism Roadshows(B2B) and Networking Evenings in Kolkata, Ahmedabad and Pune Strengthen Ties with Indian Travel Trade
Summary: Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB) and the Sri Lanka Consulate General in Mumbai held a series of tourism roadshows in Kolkata, Ahmedabad, and Pune on September 25, 27, and 29, 2023. The events aimed to strengthen ties with the Indian travel trade industry through networking evenings and B2B interactions.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia facilitates donation of medicine worth of USD 70,000 to Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia helped coordinate a donation of medicine valued at USD 70,000 (Rs 23,000,000.00) from Unimed Sdn Bhd, a well-known Malaysian pharmaceutical company, to the people of Sri Lanka. The donation aims to support healthcare initiatives in Sri Lanka.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne Conducts Mobile Consular Service
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne organized a mobile consular service for the Sri Lankan community on October 28, 2023, at the Box Hill Town Hall. The event was led by Consul General Sandith Samarasinghe, providing assistance and services to the community members.

Title: Deportation of 31 Sri Lankans from Jordan
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan, in collaboration with the Public Security Directorate of Jordan, facilitated the deportation of 31 Sri Lankans who were granted deportation orders by the Jordanian authorities.

Title: Pimpri Chinchwad Education Trust offers scholarships to Sri Lankan Students
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai recently met with the Executive Director of the Pimpri Chinchwad Education Trust (PCET), Maharashtra, offering scholarships to Sri Lankan students for educational opportunities. This initiative aims to support Sri Lankan students in pursuing their academic goals.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow participates in a cultural exhibition “Tea? Coffee? Spirit and Traditions of Hospitality” in Torzhok, Tver region
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Russia took part in the opening ceremony of the cultural exhibition "Tea? Coffee? Spirit and Traditions of Hospitality" in Torzhok, Tver region on October 17, 2023. The event showcased the rich cultural heritage of Sri Lanka through its hospitality traditions.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia Delivers a lecture to Directors of Moscow Schools
Summary: On October 19, 2023, Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Russia, Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage, delivered a lecture to the Principals of Moscow schools at the Moscow Metropolitan Governance Y platform. The lecture aimed to provide insights and foster educational cooperation between Sri Lanka and Russia.

Title: First Direct Charter Flight from Prague to Colombo Ceremonially Inaugurated
Summary: The inaugural direct charter flight from Prague to Colombo, operated by LOT Polish Airlines, took off on October 24 from Prague International Airport. This marks the first direct flight between the Czech Republic and Sri Lanka, offering a new travel option for passengers.

Title: Sri Lankan Enterprises take part in Indonesia’s Largest Halal Expo
Summary: Three prominent Sri Lankan companies, PT Expo Freight-EFL, PT Advantis Akaza, and PT David Roy participated in the "Indonesia Sharia Economic Festival - HALAL Expo Indonesia (ISEF-HEI) 2023" from October 25 to 29. Sri Lankan enterprises showcased their offerings at Indonesia's largest Halal Expo during the event.

Title: IN-KIND DONATION OF SPECIALIZED MEDICINE WORTH USD 2.9 MILLION FROM HEART TO HEART INTERNATIONAL IN THE UNITED STATES TO THE PEOPLE OF SRI LANKA
Summary: Heart to Heart International in the United States has donated specialized medicine worth USD 2.9 million to the people of Sri Lanka. The donation was made under the guidance of His Excellency Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe, as announced in a joint press release by the Embassy of Sri Lanka, Washington D.C., and Heart to Heart International.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka participates in the Katina Ceremony of Washington Buddhist Vihara
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka participated in the Katina Ceremony at the Washington Buddhist Vihara on Sunday, October 22, 2023. The event included the annual Katina Robe offering ceremony and was attended by the Chief Prelate of Canada, Most Ven. Pannaloka Maha T.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Türkiye hosts a Tourism Promotion Event in Bursa
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Türkiye hosted a tourism and cultural promotion event called "SRI LANKA in Bursa" in Bursa to commemorate Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence celebrated on 4 February 2023.

Title: State Minister of Energy H.H.A.D.I. Anuruddha led the Sri Lanka Delegation to the Third Asian and   Pacific Energy Forum at UNESCAP
Summary: State Minister of Energy H.H.A.D.I. Anuruddha led the Sri Lanka Delegation at the Third Asian and Pacific Energy Forum held from October 19 to 20, 2023, at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP). The forum aimed to discuss energy-related issues and strategies in the region.

Title: Ambassador Asirwatham called on the Vice President of the European Parliament, who leads the EU parliamentary delegation to Sri Lanka
Summary: Ambassador Grace Asirwatham of Sri Lanka met with Heidi Hautala, Vice President of the European Parliament and MEP from Finland, who leads the EU parliamentary delegation to Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission Conducts Mobile Consular Service in Batu Pahat, State of Johor, Malaysia
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia organized a mobile consular service at Song Lin Garment Sdn Bhd in Batu Pahat, Johor, to assist Sri Lankan workers and address their challenges. This initiative aimed to provide support and convenience to the Sri Lankan community in the region.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai participates in Indian Merchants Chamber of Commerce & Industry “Business Connect 2023”
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai took part in the "Business Connect 2023" event organized by the Indian Merchants Chamber of Commerce & Industry (IMC) in Mumbai. The event aimed to facilitate business connections and opportunities.

Title: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe undertakes an official visit to Mexico
Summary: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe, Sri Lanka's Ambassador to the United States and concurrently accredited to Mexico, conducted his inaugural official visit to Mexico City from October 17 to 21, 2023.

Title: “SRI LANKA shines in Antalya”
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Türkiye organized a tourism and cultural promotional event in Antalya to celebrate Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence on 04 February 2023. The event highlighted Sri Lanka's rich heritage and attractions to commemorate this significant milestone.

Title: Ambassador Prof. Janitha A. Liyanage speaks at the Russian Environmental Forum 2023
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Russia, Professor Janitha A. Liyanage, spoke at the Russian Environmental Forum 2023, which started on October 13, 2023. The Forum gathered key players in the environmental field for discussions and collaboration.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and Northern Emirates spearheads Sri Lanka IT BPO Promotion in Dubai
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and the Northern Emirates led a promotion of Sri Lanka's IT BPO sector in Dubai, in partnership with the Department of Commerce, the Sri Lanka IT Professionals' Association in Dubai, and Trainocate Gulf. The event aimed to boost business opportunities and collaboration in the IT industry between the two countries.

Title: “A Journey of Flavour and Aroma from Sri Lanka to Belgium” – Ceylon tea promoted in Brussels
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Belgium organized a Ceylon tea promotion and tasting event, "A Journey of Flavour and Aroma from Sri Lanka to Belgium," at the Press Club Brussels on October 18. This event aimed to showcase the unique flavors of Ceylon tea to a Belgian audience, promoting cultural exchange and appreciation for Sri Lankan tea traditions.

Title: Deputy High Commission in Chennai conducts 30th Special Consular Camp
Summary: The Deputy High Commission of Sri Lanka in Chennai held its 30th special consular camp on October 17, 2023. During the camp, 260 resettled Sri Lankans from 18 rehabilitation camps received consular services at the Post premises.

Title: Lecture on “Historical Relations between Sri Lanka and Middle East” by Professor Raj Somaveda
Summary: Professor Raj Somaveda delivered a lecture on the historical relations between Sri Lanka and the Middle East, in line with the 2014 Memorandum of Understanding for Collaboration in Culture and Arts between Bahrain and Sri Lanka. The initiative aims to strengthen bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Panel Discussion in Canberra, Australia on “Pathways to Economic Recovery in Sri Lanka”
Summary: A panel discussion on "Pathways to Economic Recovery in Sri Lanka" was held in Canberra, Australia, in collaboration with the University of New South Wales (UNSW) and the Institute of Global Development, at the request of the Sri Lanka High Commission. The event aimed to address current developments in Sri Lanka and explore strategies for economic recovery.

Title: Sri Lankan Theater Performance ‘Ken B Eniwan’s Story’ Receives Overwhelming Response from Audience in Karachi
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi, supported by Sri Lankan Airlines, organized the successful performance of 'Ken B Eniwan's Story' by Sri Lanka's Stages Theatre Group at the Pakistan International Theatre. The event received an overwhelming response from the audience in Karachi, showcasing the popularity of Sri Lankan theater in the region.

Title: Ambassador Janaka Bandara meets with Religious Affairs and Culture Minister of Myanmar
Summary: Ambassador Janaka Bandara of Sri Lanka met with Myanmar's Religious Affairs and Culture Minister U Tin OoLwin on October 16, 2023, at the Religious Affairs and Culture Ministry in Nay Pyi Taw. The meeting aimed to discuss bilateral cooperation in cultural and religious affairs between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan visits M/S Classic Fashion Apparel Industry
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan visited M/S Classic Fashion Apparel Industry Co. Ltd in Ramtha, Irbid, Jordan on 15.10.2023. The company employs over 1200 Sri Lankans, showcasing the strong ties between the two countries.

Title: SLUNA Board Members meet with Sri Lanka’s Consul General in Toronto
Summary: The new board members of the Sri Lanka United National Association of Canada (SLUNA) held a meeting with Sri Lanka's Consul General Thushara Rodrigo at the Consulate General in Toronto on October 15, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss collaboration and initiatives between SLUNA and the Sri Lankan Consulate in Toronto.

Title: SRI LANKA IN ADANA”: AN EVENING OF IMMERSION IN SRI LANKAN CULTURE
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Turkey hosted an event in Adana to promote Sri Lankan tourism and culture, marking the country's 75th anniversary of Independence celebrated on 04 February 2023. The event offered an immersive experience in Sri Lankan culture for attendees.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commissioner Calls on Governor of the State of Malaka
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner in Malaysia, Air Chief Marshal Sumangala Dias, met with the Governor of the State of Malaka, Dr. Mohd Ali bin Mohd Rustam, on 27 September 2023 at the Governor’s Office.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan Participates in 59th Annual Diplomatic Bazaar in Amman
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan took part in the 59th Annual Diplomatic Bazaar at Al Hussein Youth City on October 7, 2023. The event was held under the patronage of HRH Princess Basma Bint Talal, showcasing diplomatic relations and cultural exchange.

Title: Ambassador Dr. Chanaka Harsha Talpahewa presents credentials to the President of the Republic of the Philippines
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Chanaka Harsha Talpahewa presented his credentials to President Ferdinand R. Marcos, Jr., of the Republic of the Philippines on 10 October 2023 at the Malacañan Palace. Dr. Talpahewa serves as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Philippines.

Title: Australia-Sri Lanka Business Council Organizes Sri Lanka Tourism Forum
Summary: The Australia-Sri Lanka Business Council organized the Sri Lanka Tourism Forum on September 26, 2023, at the Manning, with Consul General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne, Sandith Samarasinghe, as the guest speaker.

Title: Ambassador Asirwatham participates in a high-level policy event on  “Looking Back, Looking Forward: Ten Years of China’s BRI” in Brussels
Summary: Ambassador Grace Asirwatham, representing Sri Lanka, participated as a panelist in a high-level policy event in Brussels focused on "Looking Back, Looking Forward: Ten Years of China’s BRI." The event discussed the Belt and Road Initiative's impact over the past decade.

Title: Almsgiving at Sri Lanka Embassy in Austria
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Vienna, Austria, conducted an almsgiving ceremony for the Maha Sangha alongside the annual Katina ceremony of the Dhammazentrum-Nyanaponika in Austria.

Title: Business Delegation from National Chamber of Exporters (NCE) concludes successful visit to the United Kingdom
Summary: A twelve-member business delegation from the National Chamber of Exporters of Sri Lanka (NCE) recently concluded a successful visit to the United Kingdom from 11 to 16 September 2021. The visit was organized by the Sri Lanka High Commission in London to foster business ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka stages Unique Cultural Performance at World Culture Festival 2023 in Washington DC
Summary: Renowned artiste Jananath Warakagoda led a Sri Lankan dancing troupe, along with Chathuri Wickramaarachchi from the "Natamu School of Traditional Sri Lankan Dance," in a unique cultural performance at the World Culture Festival 2023 in Washington DC. The performance showcased traditional Sri Lankan dance forms and was well-received by the audience.

Title: Commemoration of 75 years of Sri Lanka – U.S. Diplomatic Relations in Washington D.C.
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrated the 75th anniversary of Sri Lanka-U.S. diplomatic relations on September 27, 2023, with a reception featuring cultural performances.

Title: Promotion of Ceylon Tea in Chile
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brazil, also accredited to Chile, collaborated with the Sri Lanka Tea Board to organize a 'Sri Lanka pavilion' featuring twelve Sri Lankan tea producers. The event aimed to promote Ceylon Tea in Chile and strengthen bilateral trade relations between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake holds Official Meetings in Chile
Summary: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake, the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Brazil concurrently accredited to Chile, conducted an official visit to Chile from September 26 to 28, 2023. During the visit, Ambassador Dassanayake held official meetings to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam participates in Ha Noi Fall Festival 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam took part in the Ha Noi Fall Festival 2023, hosted by the Hanoi Union of Friendship Organizations (HAUFO) from September 29 to October 1, 2023, in Hoan Kiem District, Ha Noi. The festival aimed to promote cultural exchange and strengthen ties between participating countries.

Title: Promoting Sri Lankan Food & Hospitality sectors in Muscat
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat participated in the Food and Hospitality Oman (FHO) 2023 event held from 18-20 September 2023 at the Oman Convention & Exhibition Center (OCEC) in Muscat. During the event, the Embassy showcased Sri Lankan food and hospitality sectors to promote them in Muscat.

Title: Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka meets Minister for Information Technology and   Digital Services of Tamil Nadu
Summary: The Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Southern India, Dr. D. Venkateshwaran, met with Dr. Palanivel Thiaga Rajan, the Minister for Information Technology and Digital Services of the Government of Tamil Nadu. The meeting aimed to discuss potential collaborations between Sri Lanka and Tamil Nadu in the field of technology.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa holds session for South African university students on Sri Lankan economy, foreign policy and culture
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa recently hosted a session for South African university students, focusing on topics such as the Sri Lankan economy, foreign policy, and culture. The session welcomed a group of undergraduate students from the University of Pretoria studying Political Science and International Relations. This initiative aimed to engage with students and promote a better understanding of Sri Lanka's key aspects.

Title: “SRI LANKA in Georgia” Unravelling Sri Lanka’s potential for tourism in Tbilisi
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Türkiye, accredited to Georgia, organized the first mega tourism promotional event in Tbilisi on September 27, 2023, showcasing Sri Lanka's tourism potential. The event coincided with the World Tourism Day, highlighting opportunities for tourism between Sri Lanka and Georgia.

Title: Temple to Temple Diplomacy Strengthens Cultural Ties: Sri Lankan Buddhist Monks Visit Jakarta
Summary: As part of the Temple-to-Temple Diplomacy Programme by the State Ministry of Foreign Affairs, four distinguished Sri Lankan Buddhist monks visited Jakarta, Indonesia on 25 September 2023 to strengthen cultural ties. The visit aimed to enhance mutual understanding and promote cultural exchange between the two countries.

Title: ​Sri Lanka participates in the Grassroots Economy Products Exhibition  at the Thai Parliament
Summary: Sri Lanka was invited by the Secretariat of the Senate of Thailand to participate in the Grassroots Economy Products Exhibition at the Thai Parliament. The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Bangkok joined the exhibition, showcasing products from the grassroots economy.

Title: United States Institute of Peace in collaboration with Embassy of Sri Lanka host Conversation with Foreign Minister Ali Sabry
Summary: The United States Institute of Peace (USIP) and the Embassy of Sri Lanka hosted a conversation with Foreign Minister Ali Sabry at the USIP headquarters on September 28. Minister Ali Sabry engaged in discussions during the event.

Title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe meets high-profile US Business leaders in New York
Summary: President Ranil Wickremesinghe participated in a high-profile business roundtable discussion titled “Economic Opportunities in Sri Lanka” with US business leaders at the Pierre Hotel in New York on September 18, 2023. The event aimed to showcase investment prospects in Sri Lanka and foster economic partnerships between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi organizes Dancing performances in Pakistan
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi organized dancing performances by the internationally renowned Sri Lankan team, Chandana Wickramasinghe & the Dancers Guild of Sri Lanka, at the Art Council of Pakistan.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels Hosts a Tourism Promotion  Workshop in Antwerp
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels organized a tourism promotion workshop called “Discover Sri Lanka: Unveiling the Island’s Beauty in Belgium” in Antwerp to showcase the attractions of Sri Lanka. The event aimed to introduce the beauty of Sri Lanka to the audience in Belgium.

Title: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu participates in IRANPHARMA EXPO 2023 in Tehran
Summary: Ambassador G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu of Sri Lanka attended the 08th International Exhibition on Pharmaceuticals and Related Industries, IRANPHARMA EXPO 2023, in Tehran at the invitation of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

Title: Chamber of Young Lankan Entrepreneurs (COYLE) Delegation Strengthens Business Ties in Jakarta, Indonesia
Summary: A delegation of 16 dynamic entrepreneurs from the Chamber of Young Lankan Entrepreneurs visited Jakarta, Indonesia from September 19 to 24, 2023, strengthening business ties. The visit was facilitated by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, fostering collaboration between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi organizes an event to mark the donation of 25,000 corneas to Pakistan and a blood donation camp
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi organized an event at the Avari Towers on September 9, 2023, to mark the donation of 25,000 corneas to Pakistan from Sri Lanka. The event also included a blood donation camp. It was a significant initiative to support healthcare in Pakistan.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi initiates publication on Ramayana sites to mark the 75th anniversary of Indo-Lanka diplomatic relations
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi has initiated a publication on Ramayana sites to commemorate the 75th anniversary of Indo-Lanka diplomatic relations. This publication is part of a series of activities marking the milestone between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the World Cultures Festival 2023 in Ankara, Türkiye
Summary: Sri Lanka's Embassy in Ankara took part in the World Cultures Festival 2023 in Ankara, Türkiye on September 22 and 23, 2023, at Cermodern premises. The festival was organized by the Ebrişem Group and received support from various entities.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Myanmar participates in “Ganesh Utsav” Cultural Night
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Myanmar took part in the Ganesh Utsav Cultural Night on 24 September 2023 at the Hexagon Centre in Yangon, following an invitation from the Indian Ambassador Vinay Kumar. The event aimed to celebrate cultural diversity and strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in UN International Charity Luncheon 2023
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the UN International Charity Luncheon 2023 organized by the United Nations Women’s Guild (UNWG) at the Vienna International Centre in Austria. The event was attended by around 30 representatives. Sri Lanka's presence contributed to the global charitable efforts supported by the UNWG.

Title: Sri Lanka Food Festival in Karachi showcases island nation’s rich culinary heritage
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi, in partnership with the Marriot Hotel and Quality Event Pvt. Ltd., hosted a Sri Lanka Food Festival at the Marriot Hotel in Karachi on September 9-10, 2023. The festival showcased the island nation's rich culinary heritage to attendees.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda inspects the progress of the renovation work at the Sri Lanka Buddhist Pilgrims Rest in New Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, inspected the ongoing renovation work at the Sri Lanka Buddhist Pilgrims Rest (SLBPR) in New Delhi on 22 September 2023. The Pilgrims' Rest is being renovated to enhance facilities for Sri Lankan Buddhist pilgrims visiting New Delhi.

Title: Consul General meets with the Pro-Vice Chancellor of Sree Sankaracharya University of Sanskrit
Summary: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai, Valsan Vethody, visited Sree Sankaracharya University of Sanskrit in Kalady at the invitation of the Vice-Chancellor. The meeting was held with the Pro-Vice Chancellor to discuss potential collaborations between Sri Lanka and the university.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye meets Minister of Culture and Tourism of Türkiye
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, met with Türkiye's Minister of Culture and Tourism, Mehmet Nuri Ersoy, on September 19, 2023, at the Ministry of Culture and Tourism.

Title: Sri Lanka Gemstone Exhibition and Sale in Shanghai
Summary: A Sri Lanka Gemstone Exhibition and Sale took place on 19 September 2023 at the Shanghai Consul Generals’ Club in Jinmao Building. The event featured renowned Sri Lankan gem and jewellery companies.

Title: Central Bank Governor of Viet Nam Compliments Improvement of Economy of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Governor of the Central Bank of Viet Nam, Nguyen Thi Hong, praised the recent economic progress of Sri Lanka over the past 12 months. She expressed optimism and encouragement regarding the country's improving economy.

Title: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena Attends the Opening Ceremony of Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara
Summary: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena attended the opening ceremony of the Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara, where the largest stupa in Europe was unveiled to the public on 16 September 2023. The ceremony was led by Ven. Dr. Witharandeniye Kassapa Nayaka Thera O.B.E, the Chief Incumbent of Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran promotes Ceylon Tea at the 10th International Exhibition of Drinks, Tea, Coffee and Related Industries (DRINKTECH-2023) in Iran
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran, along with the Sri Lanka Tea Board, hosted a successful Ceylon Tea promotion at the 10th International Exhibition of Drinks, Tea, Coffee, and Related Industries in Iran. The event aimed to showcase Ceylon Tea to a wider audience and promote its unique flavors and qualities.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda speaks at the first edition of the “Vaishali Festival of Democracy”   at Nalanda University in Bihar
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India Milinda Moragoda spoke at the first edition of the “Vaishali Festival of Democracy” at Nalanda University in Bihar. He highlighted that the Satara Sampada, or the four accomplishments preached by the Buddha, could serve as a strong foundation for a culture of democracy.

Title: Delegation from Defence Services Command and Staff College (DSCSC) Sri Lanka visits Indonesia
