Summary: A delegation from the Defence Services Command and Staff College (DSCSC) in Sri Lanka completed a successful 'International Collaboration Study Visit' to Indonesia from September 4 to September 14, 2023. The visit aimed to enhance cooperation and knowledge exchange between the two countries' military institutions.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels Strengthens Relations with Namur, the capital of Wallonia region in Belgium
Summary: The Sri Lankan Ambassador to Belgium, Grace Asirwatham, strengthened relations between the Sri Lankan Embassy in Brussels and Namur, the capital of Wallonia region in Belgium, during her participation in the annual International Day event on September 16.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Geoffrey Bawa featured at the 15th Seoul International Architecture Film Festival
Summary: Sri Lanka's Geoffrey Bawa was showcased at the 15th Seoul International Architecture Film Festival through a special screening of the film "Bawa's Garden" on September 14, 2023, organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Seoul in collaboration with the Korea Institute of Registered Architects (KIRA). The event took place at the Embassy premises.

Title: Sri Lanka National Defence College Delegation call on High Commissioner Moragoda
Summary: A delegation from the Sri Lanka National Defence College (SLNDC) visited India as part of their inaugural International Collaborative Study Tour and met with Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar during his official visit to Bihar to attend the 'Vaishali Democracy Festival.' The meeting took place as part of Moragoda's three-day visit to the state.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam organizes Webinar on Bilateral Investment Promotion between   Sri Lanka and Viet Nam
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka, in collaboration with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka and the Foreign Investment Agency of Viet Nam, organized a webinar to promote bilateral investments between Sri Lanka and Viet Nam.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia Showcases Rich Cultural Heritage at ICWC2023 Exhibition
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia showcased the country's rich cultural heritage at the ICWC2023 Exhibition on September 8-9, 2023. The exhibition provided a platform to exhibit the diverse cultural tapestry and promote cultural exchange.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy conducts Mobile Consular Service in Lecce, Italy
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Italy organized a mobile consular service in Lecce, Italy, on September 2-3, 2023, in response to the Sri Lankan community's request. The service aimed to assist Sri Lankan residents and workers in the region.

Title: Consul General Sandith Samarasinghe successfully concludes a series of investment meetings during official visit to Adelaide, South Australia
Summary: Consul General Sandith Samarasinghe from Sri Lanka in Melbourne successfully concluded a series of investment meetings during his official visit to Adelaide, South Australia on September 8. The visit aimed at exploring and fostering investment opportunities between Sri Lanka and South Australia.

Title: High Commissioner calls on Hon. Richard Marles, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Defence of Australia
Summary: High Commissioner Chitranganee Wagiswara visited Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Defence of Australia Richard Marles on 11 September 2023 at his office in the Federal Parliament. The meeting was a courtesy call to discuss diplomatic matters and strengthen bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka rejects High Commissioner’s Written Update and reaffirms commitment to pursuing human rights through domestic institutions
Summary: Sri Lanka rejected the written update on human rights presented at the 54th Session of the Human Rights Council in Geneva by the Deputy High Commissioner for Human Rights Nada al-Nashif. The country reaffirmed its commitment to addressing human rights issues through its domestic institutions.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at the WorldFood Istanbul Trade Fair 6-9 September 2023
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the WorldFood Istanbul Trade Fair from September 6 to 9, 2023, coordinated by the Sri Lanka Embassy in Turkey at the TÜYAP Fair and Congress Centre in Istanbul. Companies like Ceylon Tea Land Pvt. Ltd were among the participants showcasing their products.

Title: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena presents credentials as Sri Lanka’s first Permanent Representative to the International Maritime Organisation (IMO)
Summary: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena presented her credentials to Kitack Lim, Secretary General of the International Maritime Organisation (IMO) on 08 September 2023. She is Sri Lanka’s first Permanent Representative to the IMO, marking a significant milestone in the country's maritime representation.

Title: Sri Lankan Embassy in Bahrain organizes “Sri Lanka Fest” at Lulu Hypermarket, Bahrain
Summary: The Sri Lankan Embassy in Bahrain collaborated with Lulu Hypermarket to host a week-long event called "Sri Lanka Fest" from September 7-13, 2023. The event featured a Sri Lanka Produce and Food Mart, aiming to promote Sri Lankan products and cuisine to the Bahraini audience.

Title: “Embassy Cup” Cricket Tournament held in Vienna for the 3rd consecutive year
Summary: The "Embassy Cup" Cricket Tournament was organized in Vienna for the 3rd consecutive year by the Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka and Bangladesh in Austria. The event took place at the De La Salle Sp, showcasing a successful collaboration between the two embassies.

Title: Sri Lankan Contingent honoured at the U.N. Medal Award Ceremony
Summary: Ambassador designate Kapila Jayaweera participated in the Medal Awarding Ceremony at the UNIFIL Headquarters in Naqoura, South of Lebanon on September 6, 2023. The Fourteenth Sri Lankan Force Protection Contingent was honored during the event.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda bids farewell to top Indian corporate leaders
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, bid farewell to top Indian corporate leaders as he prepares to relinquish his duties at the end of the month. During his farewell, he was hosted by Adani Group’s Chairman Gautam Adani and another prominent corporate leader in India.

Title: ‘Friends of Sri Lanka’ in the European Parliament join Ambassador Asirwatham for a dinner discussion in Brussels
Summary: Ambassador Grace Asirwatham of Sri Lanka hosted a dinner discussion in Brussels for Members of the European Parliament who are part of the Friends of Sri Lanka group. The event aimed to facilitate engaging and informative dialogue between the Ambassador and the MEPs.

Title: Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Antwerp, Belgium receives Service Extension
Summary: Monique De Decker-Deprez, the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Antwerp, Belgium, received a Service Extension letter from Grace Asirwatham, the Ambassador in Brussels. This extension recognizes her continued service and dedication in her role.

Title: Ambassador-Designate of Sri Lanka to the Republic of the Philippines Dr. Chanaka Talpahewa assumes duties
Summary: Dr. Chanaka Talpahewa, the Ambassador-Designate of Sri Lanka to the Republic of the Philippines, officially started his duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Manila on September 4, 2023. The commencement included religious and traditional observances.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Myanmar visits Cyclone Mocha hit Rakhine State
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Myanmar, Janaka Bandara, visited the Cyclone Mocha-hit Rakhine State on September 1-2, 2023, as part of a special diplomatic delegation led by Union Minister U Ko Ko Hlai. The visit aimed to assess the impact of the cyclone and show solidarity with the affected region.

Title: Visit of Melbourne Rebels and Rugby Victoria
Summary: Officials from Melbourne Rebels and Rugby Victoria recently completed a successful visit to Sri Lanka to explore opportunities for cooperation in promoting Sri Lanka tourism in Australia and developing sports tourism. The visit aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries in the tourism and sports sectors.

Title: 06th Round of Sri Lanka-Thailand Free Trade Agreement Negotiations was successfully concluded in Bangkok, Thailand
Summary: The 06th Round of Sri Lanka-Thailand Free Trade Agreement (SLTFTA) Negotiations successfully concluded in Bangkok, Thailand from 21-23 August. The negotiations were co-chaired by the Director General of the Department of Trade Negotiations.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka, Mumbai celebrates Onam Festival
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrated the Onam Festival on 29 August 2023. Onam holds significant religious importance in India, particularly among the people of Kerala who express gratitude during the celebration.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda delivers lecture on Indo-Lanka relations at Ananta Center, New Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, delivered a lecture titled “India-Sri Lanka Relations: Promoting Connectivity, Catalysing Prosperity” at the Ananta Centre in New Delhi on August 30, 2023. The lecture focused on strengthening ties between the two countries.

Title: “Singapore and Sri Lanka at 50: Perspectives from Sri Lanka” joint research publication launched at  the National University of Singapore (NUS)
Summary: The Institute of South Asian Studies (ISAS) at the National University of Singapore (NUS) and Sri Lanka launched a joint research publication titled "Singapore and Sri Lanka at 50: Perspectives from Sri Lanka" at NUS. The publication marks the 50th anniversary of diplomatic relations between Singapore and Sri Lanka, offering insights from Sri Lankan perspectives on the bilateral ties.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Israel opens Kids Corner
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Israel has launched a Kids Corner for children accompanying their parents to avail of consular services. Children residing in Tel Aviv and nearby areas are actively participating in this initiative. This new feature aims to create a more welcoming environment for families visiting the Embassy.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka honours the Most Venerable (Dr.) Henepola Gunarathana Nayake Maha Thero for 55 years of religious and social service in the United States of America
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C., in collaboration with the Bhāvanā Society and Maryland Buddhist Vihara, honored the Most Venerable (Dr.) Henepola Gunarathana Nayake Maha Thero for his 55 years of religious and social service in the United States of America. This event was part of the 75th Anniversary celebration of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the United States.

Title: Sri Lankan High Commissioner in Kenya joins Uganda Cricket Association Chairman Michael Nuwagaba for ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 Trophy Tour
Summary: Sri Lankan High Commissioner in Kenya, Kana Kananathan, was invited by Uganda Cricket Association Chairman Michael Nuwagaba to be a distinguished guest for the ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 Trophy Tour, highlighting the unifying power of sports. The event symbolized a significant moment in fostering international relations through cricket.

Title: Sri Lanka Participates at the 7th China-South Asia Exposition and 27th China (Kunming) Import & Export Fair
Summary: Sri Lanka's exhibitors participated in the 7th China-South Asia Exposition and 27th China (Kunming) Import & Export Fair, with coordination by the Commercial Division of the Sri Lankan Embassy in Beijing. The event showcased Sri Lankan products and promoted trade relations between the two countries.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda visits Mahabodhi Centre in Bhubaneswar
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, visited the Mahabodhi Centre in Bhubaneswar during his recent three-day official visit to the State of Odisha. The visit was part of his engagement with the Mahabodhi Society of India (MBSI) during his trip.

Title: Repatriation of 32 Stranded Sri Lankan Migrant Workers from Oman
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat, Oman, along with the Omani Foreign Ministry and the Department of Immigration of the Royal Oman Police, successfully facilitated the repatriation of 32 stranded Sri Lankan migrant workers.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta organizes the Sahabat Sri Lanka program
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta organized the Sahabat Sri Lanka program, which was attended by Indonesian youth at the embassy premises on 25 August 2023. The majority of participants were International Relations students. The program aimed to foster cultural exchange and strengthen ties between the two nations.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda pays farewell call on Indian Minister of Road Transport and Highways Nitin Gadkari
Summary: Sri Lankan High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, bid farewell to Indian Minister of Road Transport and Highways, Nitin Gadkari, during a meeting in New Delhi on August 24. The meeting marked a diplomatic exchange between the two officials before High Commissioner Moragoda's departure.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy organizes Food Festival in Israel
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Israel hosted a Food Festival, presenting 32 traditional Sri Lankan dishes to highlight the country's culinary variety. The event took place at the Ambassador's residence, showcasing the rich food culture of Sri Lanka.

Title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe undertakes successful visit to Singapore
Summary: President Ranil Wickremesinghe successfully completed a Working Visit to Singapore on August 21-22, 2023. He engaged in extensive bilateral discussions with the President of Singapore during his visit.

Title: The Ves Ceremony and Pahim Path Mangalya held at the Embassy premises showcasing Sri Lankan Traditional Dance
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington, D.C., collaborated with the Natamu School of Sri Lankan Traditional Dance in Maryland to host the Ves Ceremony and Pahim Path Mangalya, showcasing Sri Lankan traditional dance. The event aimed to promote Sri Lankan culture in the United States and was held at the Embassy premises.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy Promotes Sri Lanka Tourism and Cuisines in Brazil
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Brazil showcased Sri Lanka's tourism, cuisine, and Ceylon Tea at the Annual Bazaar of Asian and Oceania countries at the Museu de Arte de Brasilia on August 19, 2023. The event aimed to promote Sri Lanka's cultural offerings to a Brazilian audience.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets the Chief Minister and the Governor during official visit to the State of Odisha
Summary: During his three-day official visit to the State of Odisha, Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with the Chief Minister and the Governor. The meetings aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: A Cultural delegation from Myanmar visits Sri Lanka
Summary: A cultural delegation from Myanmar, including trustees of the Sacred Shwedagon Pagoda, will visit Sri Lanka from August 25 to September 1, 2023. The delegation's visit aims to strengthen cultural ties between the two countries and enhance mutual understanding.

Title: Ambassador Colombage meets APINDO Chairwoman to foster Economic Collaboration
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia and ASEAN, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, met with APINDO Chairwoman Shinta W Kamdani on August 18, 2023, to enhance economic collaboration. The meeting was productive and aimed at fostering closer ties between the two countries.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi felicitates its long-serving local staff for the third consecutive year
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi honored seven long-serving local staff members for completing twenty-four years of service, marking the third consecutive year of recognition. Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented the felicitations during the ceremony.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda addresses the National Defence College
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, spoke to the students of the 63rd National Defence Course at the National Defence College in New Delhi on August 18, 2023. He addressed the theme 'Evolution of India' during his presentation.

Title: Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena participates as Chief Guest at the 7th China – South Asia Kunming Expo
Summary: Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena participated as the Chief Guest at the 7th China-South Asia Kunming Expo from August 16-20, 2023. He delivered the keynote speech at the opening ceremony of the event, which also included the 27th China Kunming Import and Export Fair.

Title: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Vienna celebrates the 10th anniversary  of Sri Lankan elephants at Prague Zoo
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Vienna, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, commemorated the 10th anniversary of gifting two elephants to Prague Zoo and celebrated International Elephant Day. The event highlighted the enduring bond between Sri Lanka and the Prague Zoo in supporting elephant conservation efforts.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Nairobi holds Successful  Meeting with Kenya’s Prime Cabinet Secretary to Enhance Bilateral Trade and Cooperation
Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Nairobi, Kananathan, and Kenya's Prime Cabinet Secretary, Musalia Mudavadi, successfully met to boost bilateral trade and cooperation, strengthening relations between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lankan Scouts share their experiences of the World Scout Jamboree with Sri Lanka’s Ambassador to South Korea
Summary: Sri Lankan Scouts who attended the 25th World Scout Jamboree shared their experiences with Sri Lanka's Ambassador to South Korea, Savitri Panabokke, and Minister Counsellor Chandima Abeyratne. The meeting took place on 1.

Title: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage visits MAS Holding Facilities in Semarang, Indonesia
Summary: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia and ASEAN, visited MAS Holding Facilities in Semarang, Indonesia. The facilities included PT MAS ARYA 1, PT MAS SILUETA INDONESIA, and PT PRYM INTIMA. The visit aimed to strengthen ties and explore collaboration opportunities between Sri Lanka and Indonesia.

Title: Portrait of St. Joseph Vaz, the Apostle of Sri Lanka unveiled at the Archbishop House in Mumbai
Summary: During his two-day official visit to Maharashtra, Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, unveiled a portrait of St. Joseph Vaz, known as the 'Apostle of Sri Lanka,' at the Archbishop's House in Mumbai.

Title: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu paid a visit to IORA Regional Centre for  Science and Technology Transfer (RCSTT) in Tehran
Summary: Ambassador G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu of Sri Lanka visited the Indian Ocean Rim Association (IORA) Regional Centre for Science and Technology Transfer (RCSTT) in Tehran on August 9.

Title: Sri Lankan High Commissioner and Kenyan Chief of Defence Forces Forge Collaborative Defence Initiatives
Summary: The Sri Lankan High Commissioner to Kenya, Kana Kananathan, and the Chief of the Defence Forces of Kenya, General Francis Omondi Ogoll, recently met to strengthen bilateral ties and discuss collaborative defence initiatives. This meeting marks a significant step towards enhancing cooperation between the two countries in the defense sector.

Title: Myanmar Prime Minister presents Marble Replicas of Maravijaya Buddha Statue to the Sri Lankan dignitaries
Summary: Myanmar Prime Minister Senior General Min Aung Hlaing presented marble replicas of the Maravijaya Buddha Statue to Sri Lankan dignitaries, aiming to enhance the longstanding religious ties between the two nations. The replicas were handed over as a gesture of strengthening the religious connectivity between Myanmar and Sri Lanka.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow Initiates Direct Employment Opportunities for Sri Lankan Skilled Migrant Workers in the Russian Federation
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Moscow has launched direct employment opportunities for Sri Lankan skilled migrant workers in the Russian Federation for the first time in history. This initiative aims to facilitate job placements for Sri Lankan workers in collaboration with local authorities.

Title: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera Commends Japanese Artist Toshiro Kurihara’s Solo Exhibition of Paintings Depicting Sri Lanka at Gallery Bian in Ginza
Summary: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera commended Japanese artist Toshiro Kurihara's solo exhibition at Gallery Bian in Ginza. The exhibition showcases paintings depicting Sri Lanka and highlights Kurihara's distinguished career as a former primary school teacher.

Title: Possible cooperation with Government of Palau on employment opportunities and other sectors
Summary: Ambassador Peter Adelbai of Palau in Tokyo met with Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera to discuss potential cooperation in sourcing migrant labor from Sri Lanka for employment opportunities and other sectors. They engaged in a productive discussion to explore this possibility further.

Title: In-Kind Donation of Cancer Medicine worth USD 12.8 Million from Heart to Heart International   in The United States to the People of Sri Lanka
Summary: Heart to Heart International has donated cancer medicines worth USD 12.8 million to address the shortage in Sri Lanka. Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe requested the urgent donation to support the healthcare needs of the people in Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka Meets Chairperson of Israel – Sri Lanka Parliamentary Friendship Group
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador Nimal Bandara met with Dr. (Ms.) M.E. Melaku, the new Chairperson of the Israel-Sri Lanka parliamentary friendship group. They held discussions during a special guest committee meeting.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lankan in Viet Nam organizes a Familiarization tour to Vietnamese media
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB), organized a Familiarization Trip for Vietnamese media from May 7 to 14, 2023. Five media personnel, including Lai Thi Thuy Ha from Van Hoa News, participated in the tour to promote Sri Lankan tourism.

Title: Sri Lankan Scouts safely evacuated from World Scout Jamboree site
Summary: Sri Lankan Scouts participating in the 25th World Scout Jamboree in South Korea were safely evacuated from the Saemangeum Jamboree site on August 8 due to Typhoon Khanun.

Title: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake Presents Credentials in Argentina
Summary: Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake, representing Sri Lanka in Brazil, also presented his credentials as the Ambassador to Argentina by submitting his Letter of Credence to the President.

Title: Ambassador H.M.G.R.R.K. Wijeratne Mendis calls on Crown Prince, Deputy Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces and Prime Minister of Bahrain
Summary: Ambassador H.M.G.R.R.K. Wijeratne Mendis of Sri Lanka met with Bahrain's Crown Prince and Prime Minister, His Royal Highness Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa, at Gudaibiya Palace on August 3rd.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington D.C. commemorates Colonel Henry Steel Olcott
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington D.C. commemorated Colonel Henry Steel Olcott, an American national, for his service to Sri Lanka. The event took place on August 2, 2023, at the Embassy premises.

Title: Sri Lankan Buddhist Monks attend the consecration ceremony of World’s tallest Maravijaya Buddha Image in Myanmar
Summary: A delegation of eleven Buddhist Monks from Sri Lanka participated in the consecration ceremony of the world's tallest Maravijaya Buddha Image in Myanmar on August 1, 2023, at the Buddha Park in Nay Pyi Taw. The ceremony marked an important event in promoting cultural and religious ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi facilitated a Pakistan Business Delegation to Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi, in collaboration with the Pakistan Sri Lanka Business Forum (PSLBF), facilitated a Pakistan Business Delegation to Sri Lanka from 18-22 July 2023. The delegation aimed to enhance business relations between the two countries.

Title: Kasmira Jayaweera from Veyangoda Bandaranayake Central College is awarded “Most Peaceful Prize” at “04th Children’s World Peace Summit” in Japan
Summary: Kasmira Jayaweera from Veyangoda Bandaranayake Central College was awarded the "Most Peaceful Prize" at the 4th Children’s World Peace Summit in Japan for her eloquent presentation on peacebuilding. Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera and Embassy staff congratulated her on this achievement.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam organizes a Webinar  on Gem and Jewelry Sector of Sri Lanka and Viet Nam
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam recently hosted a webinar on the Gem and Jewelry sectors of both countries, in partnership with the National Gem and Jewelry Authority (NGJA) and the Viet Nam Association of Gemstones. The event aimed to promote collaboration and knowledge exchange in this industry.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta Organizes a Familiarization Tour to Promote Sri Lanka as a Buddhist Tourist Destination
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta, along with SriLankan Airlines, Jetwing Travels, and Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, organized the first familiarization tour post-Covid-19 to promote Sri Lanka as a Buddhist tourist destination.

Title: Three Presidents’ Scouts of Sri Lanka in the Japanese Contingent at the “25th World Scout Jamboree” in South Korea
Summary: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera and Embassy staff met and congratulated three Presidents’ Scouts of Sri Lanka residing in Japan, including Prasad Dunstan from Saitama Prefecture and Kasun Priyankara from Kanagawa Prefecture. The scouts are part of the Japanese Contingent at the "25th World Scout Jamboree" in South Korea, representing their country with pride.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka Donates Buddha Statue to the White House
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka donated a Buddha statue to the White House during the Buddhist Vesak Festival on May 5, 2023. This event was initiated by Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe, marking the first time the festival was celebrated at the White House in Washington D.C.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa Participates in Seminar on Bilateral Trade & Investment between Sri Lanka and South Africa
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa took part in a Bilateral Trade and Investment Seminar organized by the National Chamber of Commerce (NCC) in Sri Lanka on July 20, 2022. The High Commission was represented at the seminar.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Myanmar attends the Wreath Laying Ceremony to mark   the 76th Anniversary of Martyrs’ Day of Myanmar
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Myanmar, Janaka Bandara, participated in the Wreath Laying Ceremony at the Martyrs’ Mausoleum in Yangon to commemorate the 76th Anniversary of Martyrs’ Day in Myanmar. The event marked an important occasion for the Republic of the Union of Myanmar.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Myanmar attends the 21st Convocation Ceremony of International Theravada Buddhist Missionary University of Myanmar
Summary: Ambassador Janaka Bandara of Sri Lanka attended the 21st Convocation Ceremony of the International Theravada Buddhist Missionary University (ITBMU) in Myanmar on July 24, 2023, as a special guest. The event marked a significant gathering of Buddhist scholars and practitioners from both countries.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda speaks at the Indian Council of World Affairs
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, spoke at a closed-door panel discussion organized by the Indian Council of World Affairs (ICWA) in New Delhi. The discussion focused on the economic recovery of Sri Lanka and upcoming visits.

Title: Ambassador Jayanath Colombage Presents Letter of Credence to Secretary General of ASEAN Dr. Kao Kim Hourn
Summary: Ambassador Jayanath Colombage assumed the post as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to ASEAN by presenting his Letter of Credence to Secretary-General Dr. Kao Kim Hourn on July 26, 2023. This formalized his role in representing Sri Lanka to the ASEAN organization.

Title: Sri Lanka Day in Ankara open up multifaceted possibilities for mutual economic cooperation
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Türkiye, in collaboration with the Türkiye-Sri Lanka Business Council, hosted a "Sri Lanka Day" event in Ankara on June 20, 2023, at the Official Residence of the Ambassador. The event aimed to showcase opportunities for mutual economic cooperation between the two countries.

Title: The Sri Lankan Apparel Industry Receives Insights on the EU Strategy for Sustainable and Circular Textiles
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels, along with the Sri Lanka Export Development Board (EDB), hosted an online briefing session on the EU Strategy for Sustainable and Circular Textiles on July 20, 2023. The Sri Lankan apparel industry gained valuable insights during the session.

Title: Consul General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and the Northern Emirates presents Letter of Commission
Summary: Consul General of Sri Lanka to Dubai and the Northern Emirates, Alexi Gunasekera, presented the Letter of Commission to Sheikh Maktoum Bin But, Director of the Office of Foreign Affairs of the United Arab Emirates in Dubai. This formalizes Gunasekera's role and strengthens diplomatic ties between Sri Lanka and the UAE.

Title: Tourism Minister Harin Fernando leads Tourism Events in Perth, Sydney and Melbourne
Summary: Tourism Minister Harin Fernando led tourism events in Perth, Sydney, and Melbourne during his visit to Australia from July 10 to 18, 2023. He conducted promotional events and meetings to showcase Sri Lanka as a travel destination for Australian tourists. The aim was to boost tourism ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa Participates in Nelson Mandela International Day Activities led by the South African Foreign Minister
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in South Africa joined community service activities at the Bophelong Community Center in Mame, led by South African Foreign Affairs Minister Dr. Naledi Pandor in honor of Nelson Mandela International Day. The event aimed to commemorate the day through service and solidarity.

Title: Sri Lankan-Canadian Community Association takes lead to support reconciliation in Sri Lanka
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, Thushara Rodrigo, attended the Annual General Meeting of the Sri Lanka United National Association of Canada (SLUNA) on July 16, 2023, in Toronto. SLUNA, a leading organization within the Sri Lankan-Canadian community, is taking the initiative to support reconciliation efforts in Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lankan​ human trafficking​ victim repatriated from Myanmar
Summary: A Sri Lankan victim of human trafficking, stranded in Myanmar since December 2022, has been repatriated to Sri Lanka. The individual was rescued by law enforcement authorities in Myanmar.

Title: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry attends the inaugural BIMSTEC Foreign Ministers’ Retreat in Bangkok
Summary: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry attended the inaugural BIMSTEC Foreign Ministers’ Retreat in Bangkok on 17 July 2023 at the invitation of Thailand's Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Don Pramudwinai. The retreat aimed to enhance cooperation among BIMSTEC member countries.

Title: South Asia Delegation of the European Parliament (DSAS) Seeks to Enhance Partnership between EU and South Asian Countries
Summary: The South Asia Delegation of the European Parliament (DSAS) convened with Ambassadors from South Asian countries at the European Parliament in Strasbourg, France on July 12, 2023, to discuss and enhance the partnership between the EU and South Asian nations. The meeting aimed to foster stronger relations and collaboration between the two regions.

Title: Incorporating national policies is a core requirement for successful implementation of SDGs – Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York
Summary: On July 14, 2023, Sri Lanka's Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York, Ambassador Mohan Peiris, emphasized the importance of incorporating national policies for successful SDGs implementation. He chaired a session discussing the integration of South-South and Triangular Cooperation in Voluntary National Reviews. This highlights the crucial role of aligning national strategies with global development goals.

Title: Sri Lanka  Consulate General in Dubai celebrates the Richness of Sri Lankan Products at the “Best of Sri Lanka” Lulu Hypermarket Campaign

Sri Lanka High Commissioner in Kenya, Veluppillai Kananathan, also accredited to Benin, presented his letter of credence to President Talon in Cotonou. This move aims to strengthen economic ties between the two countries.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo Hosts Productive Tourism Promotion Event for Japanese Media
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, hosted a successful tourism promotion event for Japanese media at the Ambassador's official residence. The event aimed to showcase Sri Lanka's attractions and boost tourism interest among Japanese audiences.

The event was attended by representatives from over 25 member states and other diplomatic entities, showcasing Sri Lanka's culture and offerings.

The FoC is recognized as the largest community cricket festival in the UK, bringing together cricket enthusiasts and players.

Title: Deputy High Commissioner bids farewell to Mr. Oscar Munida, Chief of Mission of the UNHCR in India Maldives

Title: Sri Lanka Participates at the EXPO Turismo Goiás 2023 in Brazil

Pasindu Mihiran, a young inventor from Sri Lanka, for winning the Platinum and Gold Medals at the Japan Design, Idea, and Invention Exhibition in Tokyo. The Ambassador expressed his admiration for Pasindu's innovative achievements and talent in the field of invention.

The visit involved a unique retreat that integrated spiritual practices, sustainable living, and eco-tourism, providing a holistic experience for the staff.

Title: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka meets Associate Administrator of University Teknologi Petronas
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka, Air Chief Marshal (Retd) Sumangala Dias, met with the Associate Administrator of University Teknologi Petronas on July 7, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss potential collaborations between Sri Lanka and the university.

Summary: Alexi Gunasekera, the newly appointed Consul General-designate of Sri Lanka to Dubai and the Northern Emirates, has officially started his duties at the Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Dubai on July 10, 2023. Gunasekera addressed the staff and began his role in representing Sri Lanka in the region.

Title: Sri Lanka Expands Partnership with the State of Goiás in Brazil

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Jordan attends the Annual Long Service Award Ceremony of MAS AL SAFI Apparel Manufacturing LLC
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Jordan, J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekara, participated in the Annual Long Service Award Ceremony of MAS AL SAFI Apparel Manufacturing LLC in Amman on June 22, 2023. The event celebrated employees' long-standing dedication and service.

Title: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage calls on Governor of National Resilience Institute of the Republic of Indonesia (LEMHANNAS)
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, met with Dr. Andi Widjajanto, the Governor of Indonesia's National Resilience Institute (LEMHANNAS), on July 6, 2023, for a courtesy visit.

Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka, Air Chief Marshal (Retd) Sumangala Dias, met with the Associate Vice Chancellor (Global Engagement) of the University of Malaya on June 16, 2023. The discussion focused on establishing collaboration between the two institutions.

Summary: The Minister of Ports, Shipping, and Aviation of Sri Lanka delivered the keynote address at the Seafarer 2050 Conference in Manila on June 26, 2023. Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington DC recently partnered with the Wharton Club of DC to host an event promoting trade and investment opportunities in Sri Lanka. He shared the country's experience during a high-level panel discussion at the World Leader’s Summit, emphasizing the importance of effective financial strategies for sustainable development.

Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Malaysia, Air Chief Marshal (Retd) Sumangala Dias, visited the Headquarters of the Federal Land Development Authority (FELDA), a Malaysian Government Agency. He met with the Chairman of FELDA during the visit.

Priyangika Wijegunasekara, met with the Chief of Mission of the International Organization for Migration (IOM) in Jordan, Tajma Kurt, at the UN Migration Agency on June 20, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss cooperation and initiatives between Sri Lanka and the IOM in Jordan.

Summary: The Consulate General in Milan organized an interactive session with members of the 2601 Muthuhara Children’s Society at the Consul General’s Office on May 25, 2023. The children from the Muthuhara Society in Milan actively participated in the session, engaging with the Consul General and staff.

The event was part of a dialogue with leading faiths in India, highlighting the significance of St. Joseph Vaz in Sri Lankan history.

Summary: High Commissioner Milinda Moragoda met with Indian Home Affairs Secretary Shri Ajay Kumar Bhalla on 20 June 2023 as part of his regular dialogue with key ministries in the Indian government. The meeting aimed to discuss ongoing cooperation and mutual interests between the two countries.

Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, engaged with commercial diplomats concurrently accredited to Sri Lanka from New Delhi to enhance bilateral relations. The interactive session aimed to further expand engagement with the New Delhi-based missions.

Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage held a virtual meeting with Universitas Budi Luhur (UBL) on 15 June 2023 to discuss collaboration opportunities. The meeting focused on enhancing cooperation between UBL and other educational institutions.

Summary: Ambassador Jayanath Colombage of Sri Lanka met with Kevin Wu, an Indonesian businessman, and an official from the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry to discuss cooperation in trade, tourism, and investment. The discussions aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries in these key areas.

The event aimed to showcase various economic cooperation opportunities between the two countries, highlighting the potential for multifaceted collaboration.

Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo, along with Samurai Lanka Co., Ltd. and the Niigata Chamber of Commerce and Industry, held a Sri Lanka Business Promotion event to showcase business opportunities in Niigata Prefecture, Japan.

Summary: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera visited Niigata and met with Deputy Governor Koichi Kasatori on June 8, 2023. They discussed ways to strengthen ties between their regions.

The health-focused relief and development organization acted under the guidance of Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe to provide critical assistance.

The event brought together members of both communities to commemorate this important festival.

Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta celebrated Vesak and Poson Full Moon Poya Day on June 3, 2023, with a significant turnout of representatives from various Buddhist Associations. The event took place at the Embassy premises.

Title: Indonesia Maju Forum and Expo 2023
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, attended the opening ceremony of the "Indonesia Maju Forum and Expo 2023" on 1 June 2023. Title: The Consulate General participates at the 2nd Annual Feast of Our Lady of Fatima Tamil Catholic Chaplaincy in Mississauga, Canada
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka, along with its staff, participated in the 2nd Annual Feast of Our Lady of Fatima at the Tamil Catholic Chaplaincy in Mississauga, Canada. They attended the Special Mass upon the invitation of Rev. Fr. Canisius Raj Felix, the Head Priest of the Chaplaincy.

Title: Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka meets ‘Superstar’ Rajinikanth
Summary: Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka Dr. D. Venkateshwaran met Padma Bhushan 'Superstar' Rajinikanth, a renowned South Indian actor, at his residence on 29 May 2023. During the meeting, the DHC extended an invitation to Mr. Rajinikanth.

Title: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu highlights measures taken by Sri Lanka for the Women’s Economic Empowerment
Summary: Ambassador G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu led a Sri Lankan delegation at the 7th Meeting of the Working Group of Women’s Economic Empowerment of the Indian Ocean Rim Association (IORA). During the meeting, he highlighted the measures taken by Sri Lanka to promote women's economic empowerment.

Title: Bangladesh and Sri Lanka enhance cooperation in tourism sector
Summary: Bangladesh and Sri Lanka are enhancing cooperation in the tourism sector, leveraging their historical linkages and cultural similarities to promote tourism. High Commissioner Prof. Sudharshan Seneviratne emphasized the potential for both countries to boost their tourism industries through collaboration.

Title: Sri Lanka presents Credentials to the African Union
Summary: Sri Lanka's Permanent Representative to the African Union, K.K. Theshantha Kumarasiri, presented credentials to the Chairperson of the African Union Commission, Moussa Faki Mahamat, on May 26, 2023, at AU headquarters. This formal presentation signifies Sri Lanka's official recognition and engagement with the African Union.

Title: Brazilian Technical Assistance to Dairy and Sugarcane industries in Sri Lankaa
Summary: A high-level technical team comprising eight professionals from the Federal University of Viçosa, Federal University of Sao Carlos, and the Brazilian Cooperation Agency (ABC) will conduct a technical visit to Sri Lanka. The visit aims to provide technical assistance to the dairy and sugarcane industries in Sri Lanka.

Title: Ethiopia stands ready to work with Sri Lanka in strengthening bilateral relations and multilateral cooperation
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Ethiopia, K.K. Theshantha Kumarasiri, presented credentials to Ethiopian President Sahle-Work Zewde on April 27, 2023, in Addis Ababa. Ethiopia expresses readiness to collaborate with Sri Lanka in enhancing bilateral relations and multilateral cooperation.

Title: Six Sri Lankans, victims of human trafficking in Myanmar  repatriated to Sri Lanka
Summary: Six Sri Lankans, who were victims of human trafficking and stranded in Myanmar, have been repatriated to Sri Lanka following representations made by the Government of Sri Lanka to Myanmar authorities. The individuals were rescued by Myanmar authorities and safely returned to their home country.

Title: Udayana University undergraduates visit the Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta
Summary: Udayana University undergraduates studying International Relations visited the Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta on May 26, 2023. The study tour aimed to provide insights into Sri Lanka's foreign policy and the role of the Embassy. The students gained valuable knowledge during the visit.

Title: Vesak Celebrations – 2023 in Los Angeles
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka celebrated the Vesak Festival in Los Angeles in collaboration with the Los Angeles Dharma Vijaya Buddhist Vihara (Crenshaw Temple) on May 6 and 7, 2023. The event marked Vesak in Sri Buddha Year 2567, bringing together the community to observe this important Buddhist festival in California.

Title: Brussels offers “A Glimpse of Sri Lanka” to potential high-level tourists
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels, in collaboration with the Circle Royal Gaulois and the Diplomatic Club of Belgium, organized a tourism promotion event called "A Glimpse of Sri Lanka" on May 24, 2023, at the prestigious Club. The event aimed to attract potential high-level tourists to visit Sri Lanka.

Title: Dubai Multi Commodities Centre (DMCC) organizes a webinar “Made for Trade Live – Sri Lanka in Focus”
Summary: The Dubai Multi Commodities Centre (DMCC) organized a webinar titled "Made for Trade Live – Sri Lanka in Focus." Sri Lanka's Ambassador to the United Arab Emirates, Udaya Indrarathna, delivered the keynote speech on the strategically important trade relations between Sri Lanka and the UAE on May 23, 2023. The webinar aimed to highlight opportunities for trade and collaboration between the two countries.

Title: Islamic Affairs and Endowments Minister of the Kingdom of Bahrain receives the Ambassador of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Bahrain, H.M.G.R.R.K. Wijeratne Mendis, met with Bahrain's Minister of Justice, Islamic Affairs, and Endowments, Nawaf bin Mohammed Al-Maawda, at the Justice Ministry.

Title: Buddhism in Dialogue – Sri Lanka Meets Italy
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Rome, in collaboration with the Italian Buddhist Union and the Sri Lankan community, organized three events to celebrate Vesak under the guidance of Ambassador Wellawatte. The events aimed to promote dialogue and cultural exchange between Sri Lanka and Italy in the context of Buddhism.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington DC hosts an evening reception to commemorate   75 Years of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka & the US
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington DC recently hosted an evening reception to celebrate 75 years of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the US. The event, held on May 19, 2023, showcased Sri Lanka's culture and promoted bilateral ties.

Title: Sri Lankan Envoy to Jakarta attended the opening ceremony of the ASEAN’s largest International trade Show for Automotive Industry
Summary: Ambassador Jayanath Colombage, Sri Lanka's envoy to Indonesia, participated in the opening ceremony of "INAPA 2023," the largest International Trade Show for the Automotive Industry in ASEAN, on May 24, 2023.

Title: The New Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Israel Nimal Bandara presents Credentials to Israel President Isaac Herzog
Summary: The newly appointed Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Israel, Nimal Bandara, presented his credentials to Israel's President Isaac Herzog in May 2023. The ceremony marked the official beginning of his diplomatic role in Israel.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka delivers keynote address at the Biodiversity Conference at the University of Ankara in Turkiye
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake delivered a keynote address at the Biodiversity Conference held at Ankara University on May 22, 2023, in celebration of International Biodiversity Day. The conference aimed to raise awareness and promote discussions on biodiversity conservation.

Title: Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran presented to the Ambassador of Tunisia in New Delhi
Summary: The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Ambassador of Tunisia in New Delhi as part of his engagement with Heads of Mission of Islamic countries accredited to Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi presents a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to   the Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah in Delhi
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in New Delhi presented a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah in Delhi on May 23. This gesture aligns with their policy of fostering dialogue with major religions in India, promoting cultural exchange and understanding.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta ties with the Indonesian Chamber to pursue trade and investment opportunities for Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta collaborates with the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KADIN) to explore trade and investment opportunities. Ambassador Jayanath Colombage met with KADIN representatives on May 19, 2023, to discuss potential partnerships.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran promotes Ceylon Tea at the International Tea Day 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran marked International Tea Day on May 21, 2023, by hosting a Mobile Promotion Event for Ceylon Tea in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tea Board. The event aimed to promote Ceylon Tea among attendees in Tehran.

Title: High Commisssion in Pretoria exchanges Vesak messages with Embassy of the Holy See
Summary: High Commissioner Prof. Gamini Gunawardane visited the Embassy of the Holy See as part of the Vesak Festival program, exchanging messages with Acting Head of Mission/Acting Ambassador Rev. This exchange strengthened diplomatic ties between the High Commission in Pretoria and the Embassy of the Holy See.

Title: Establishment of Student Registration Portal
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne has launched a Student Registration Portal for Sri Lankan students in Victoria, South Australia, and Tasmania, fulfilling a long-standing need. This portal aims to streamline the registration process and enhance support for students in these regions.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda presents a stone from the precinct of Seetha Amman Temple in Seetha Eliya to the Chairman of Ram Janmabhoomi Trust
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented a stone from the precinct of Seetha Amman Temple in Seetha Eliya to the Chairman of the Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Teerth Kshetra Trust, Shri Nripendr. The meeting took place with the former Principal Secretary to the Prime Minister of India.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brazil celebrates Vesak 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brazil celebrated Vesak 2023 with a Dhamma Programme themed 'Serenity of the Mind' on May 5 at the Embassy Premises. Additionally, they organized an alms giving event at the Nepalese Buddhist Temple in Brasilia on May 20.

Title: Sri Lanka Participates in the International City Day Festival in Amman
Summary: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan participated in the "International City Day Festival" in Amman, following an invitation from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and expatriates of Jordan. The event aimed to celebrate cultural diversity and international relations.

Title: Sri Lanka at the Spring Bazaar International Day in Ankara
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara took part in the Spring Bazaar International Day organized by Bilkent University East Campus in Ankara on May 16-17, 2023. The event was held on the university premises, showcasing Sri Lankan culture and products to attendees.

Title: Sri Lankan fishermen repatriated from Myanmar
Summary: Five Sri Lankan fishermen were recently released and repatriated to Sri Lanka following representations made by the Government of Sri Lanka to the Myanmar authorities. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs coordinated the repatriation process.

Title: 70th Birthday of Dr. Wijayarajapura Seelawansa Thero marked in Vienna
Summary: The 70th birthday of Most Venerable Dr. Wijayarajapura Seelawansa Thero, Chief Incumbent of Dhamma-Zentrum Nyanaponika in Austria, was celebrated in Vienna with visiting Venerable Theros from Europe and Malaysia. The event honored Dr. Seelawansa Thero's milestone birthday with a gathering of esteemed guests.

Title: UN Vesak Day 2023 Celebrated in New York in-person after three years
Summary: The Permanent Missions of Sri Lanka and Thailand to the United Nations in New York co-hosted an in-person celebration of UN Vesak Day 2023 on Thursday, 18 May. This marked the return to in-person commemorations after three years of virtual events.

Title: Labour Minister of the Kingdom of Bahrain receives Sri Lanka Ambassador
Summary: Labour Minister of the Kingdom of Bahrain, Jameel bin Mohammed Ali Humaidan, met with Sri Lankan Ambassador to Bahrain, Mrs. Reethisri Wijeratne Mendis, on May 9, 2023. During the meeting, the Minister commended the strong ties between Bahrain and Sri Lanka.

Title: High Commissioner Kananathan presents Credentials in Abuja, Nigeria
Summary: High Commissioner Veluppillai Kananathan presented his Letter of Credence appointing him as the High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to Nigeria to His Excellency Muhammadu Buhari in Abuja. He will be based in Kenya during his tenure.

Title: Sri Lanka and Uttar Pradesh resolve to further strengthen tourism, cultural and religious exchanges and people-to-people contacts
Summary: Sri Lanka and Uttar Pradesh of India have resolved to enhance cooperation in tourism, culture, religion, and people-to-people contacts. This decision was made during a meeting with the Sri Lankan High Commissioner to India, Milinda Mora.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda discusses long-term strategic cooperation in the power sector with the Minister of Power of India
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Minister of Power and New & Renewable Energy, Shri Raj Kumar Singh, in New Delhi on May 18. They discussed strategies for strengthening long-term cooperation in the power sector.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets newly appointed US Ambassador to India Eric M. Garcetti
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India Milinda Moragoda met with the newly appointed US Ambassador to India Eric M. Garcetti at the US Embassy in New Delhi on 18 May. High Commissioner Moragoda congratulated Ambassador Garcetti on his recent appointment, fostering diplomatic relations between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Italy Jagath Wellawatte meets, Deputy Speaker of the Italian House of Deputies Giorgio Mulé
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Italy, Jagath Wellawatte, met with Giorgio Mulé, Deputy Speaker of the Italian House of Deputies, at the Italian Parliament premises. Giorgio Mulé serves as the Vice President of the House of Deputies. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: First Assembly of the Sri Lankan Bhikkhu Association in Europe convened in Vienna
Summary: The first Assembly of the Sri Lankan Bhikkhu Association in Europe was inaugurated in Vienna on 13 May 2023. Over 50 Buddhist Theros from various countries including Austria, Bangladesh, Cyprus, Denmark, France, Japan, Italy, Malaysia, and Norway attended the event. The assembly marked a significant gathering of Buddhist monks from different parts of Europe and beyond.

Title: Vesak celebrations in Ottawa
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Ottawa, Canada organized a spiritual program to celebrate Vesak, honoring the birth, enlightenment, and passing away of Lord Buddha. The event, themed "Serenity of the Mind," aimed to commemorate these significant milestones.

Title: Deputv High Commissioner meets the Head of Field Office of the UNHCR in Southern India
Summary: The Deputy High Commissioner, Dr. Venkateshwaran, met with S. Valan Michael, the Head of the UNHCR Field Office in Southern India on May 11, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss refugee-related matters in the region.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan pays a courtesy call on Minister of Culture of Jordan
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan, J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekera, paid a courtesy call on the Minister of Culture, Haifa Najjar, of Jordan on May 16, 2023. The Minister warmly welcomed the Ambassador during the visit.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in London celebrates Vesak
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in London, in partnership with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, hosted its annual Vesak celebrations from May 12-14, 2023, at the High Commission premises. The festivities commenced wit.

Title: The lucrative Chinese market could provide Sri Lanka’s Tea Industry with options for expansion
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona participated as a guest speaker at the Belt and Road International Tea Trading Forum in Hefeng County, Hubei Province, where he highlighted the potential for Sri Lanka's Tea Industry to expand into the lucrative Chinese market. Hubei boasts over 700,000 hectares of meticulously maintained tea gardens, offering promising opportunities for growth and collaboration.

Title: Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran presented to the Ambassador of Saudi Arabia in New Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented a Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Ambassador of Saudi Arabia in New Delhi. This gesture aimed to strengthen dialogue with Heads of Mission of Islamic countries in the Indian capital.

Title: UBL, Indonesia undergraduates enjoy Sri Lankan Avurudu Games
Summary: UBL undergraduates from Indonesia visited the Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta on May 10, 2023, for a study tour to learn about Sri Lanka and the Embassy's functions. The students enjoyed participating in the Sri Lankan Avurudu Games during the visit, enhancing their cultural experience.

Title: Dhana in memory of late Minister Lakshman Kadirgamar
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka held an alms giving (Dhana) on May 14, 2023, at the Embassy premises in memory of the late Lakshman Kadirgamar, former Foreign Minister of Sri Lanka. The event was organized to honor and remember the contributions of the late Minister.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Canberra celebrates Vesak 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Canberra celebrated Vesak 2023 with a dhamma program honoring the birth, enlightenment, and passing of Lord Buddha. The event was held under the theme "Serenity of the Mind.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Toronto organizes a networking event for the Sri Lanka Business Delegation that participated in the SIAL Trade Exhibition in Toronto
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Toronto, in collaboration with the Canada-Sri Lanka Business Convention (CSLBC), organized a networking dinner for the 25-member Sri Lankan delegation that took part in the SIAL Trade Exhibition in Toronto. The event aimed to facilitate connections and partnerships among the delegates.

Title: Special Inquiry Hours
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Rome has introduced a "Special Inquiry Hours" program to effectively manage telephone inquiries and engage with Sri Lankans in Italy, Greece, Cyprus, San Marino, Albania, and Malta. This initiative aims to enhance communication and support for the Sri Lankan community in these countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Myanmar holds discussions with Myanmar Airways International (MAI) to establish direct air connectivity between the two countries
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Myanmar, Janaka Bandara, met with the top management of Myanmar Airways International on May 12, 2023, to discuss establishing direct air connectivity between the two countries. They are exploring opportunities to enhance travel between Sri Lanka and Myanmar through this initiative.

Title: ​Swedish and Sri Lankan Foreign Ministers agree to strengthen bilateral engagement in all spheres
Summary: Swedish Foreign Minister Tobias Billström and Sri Lankan Foreign Minister Ali Sabry agreed to enhance bilateral engagement across all sectors during Sabry's visit to Stockholm for the 2nd EU-Indo Pacific Forum. They committed to strengthening cooperation between their countries.

Title: Sri Lanka to boost collaboration with Bangladesh in shipping and maritime sectors
Summary: Sri Lanka's Minister of Ports, Shipping, and Aviation, Nimal Siripala De Silva, and State Minister of Foreign Affairs, Tharaka Balasuriya, met with the State Minister of Shipping in Bangladesh on May 12 to enhance collaboration in the shipping and maritime sectors. The discussions aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries in these key areas.

Title: Thousands visit “Geoffrey Bawa: It is Essential To be There” Exhibition which marks the 75 years of Indo-Lanka Diplomatic Relations
Summary: The "Geoffrey Bawa: It is Essential To be There" exhibition, celebrating the 75 years of Indo-Lanka Diplomatic Relations, attracted thousands of visitors at the National Gallery of Modern Art. The event showcased the works of the late iconic Sri Lankan architect Geoffrey Bawa.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara, Türkiye celebrates the  Day of Vesak
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara, Türkiye celebrated the Day of Vesak on May 5, 2023, at the United Nations Office in Ankara. The event was attended by the Head of the UN Office in Ankara, marking the significance of the occasion.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi collaborates with the National Gallery of Modern Art on Exhibition of Buddhist Art
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in New Delhi partnered with the National Gallery of Modern Art for an exhibition showcasing Buddhist art to commemorate the month of Vesak. The exhibition, held at the NGMA in New Delhi, ran for a month, highlighting the rich cultural heritage of Sri Lanka through its Buddhist art.

Title: IN-KIND DONATION OF SPECIALIZED MEDICINE WORTH USD 5.7 MILLION FROM HEART TO HEART INTERNATIONAL IN THE UNITED STATES TO THE PEOPLE OF SRI LANKA
Summary: Heart to Heart International in the United States has donated specialized medicine worth USD 5.7 million to the people of Sri Lanka. The donation was facilitated by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. under the guidance of Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe. This generous contribution aims to support healthcare initiatives in Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka celebrates the International Day of Vesak at UNESCO with a Symposium highlighting the relevance of Buddhism to contemporary life
Summary: Sri Lanka celebrated the International Day of Vesak at UNESCO with a symposium highlighting Buddhism's relevance to contemporary life. The event was organized by the Permanent Delegation of Sri Lanka in collaboration with UNESCO on Vesak Day, 05 May 2023, at the UNESCO Headquarters in Paris. The symposium aimed to showcase the significance of Buddhism in today's world.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrates Vesak Day 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrated Vesak Day 2023 with a program themed "The Serenity of the Mind," honoring the Birth, Enlightenment, and Passing Away of Lord Gautama Buddha at the Chancery. The event marked the Noble Triple Events in a ceremony that highlighted the significance of the occasion.

Title: Vesak Ceremony and Lantern Competition-2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat, in collaboration with the Sri Lankan community in the Sultanate, organized a series of events to celebrate the Vesak festival 2023 with the theme of "the serenity of the mind." The highlight of the celebrations was a Lantern Competition held in parallel with the Vesak Ceremony.

Title: Ten-member contingent representing the tri-forces of Sri Lanka participates in the Coronation Procession
Summary: A ten-member contingent from the Sri Lankan armed forces participated in the Coronation Procession of King Charles III in the UK from April 30 to May 7, 2023. The contingent represented the tri-forces of Sri Lanka and was invited by the British Government for the event.

Title: Over 3,750 Americans visited the ‘Sri Lanka Embassy Open House’ in Washington D.C. joining Passport DC 2023
Summary: Over 3,750 Americans visited the ‘Sri Lanka Embassy Open House’ in Washington D.C. as part of Passport DC’s ‘Around the World Embassy Tour’. Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe and the embassy staff welcomed visitors from 10.00 a.m. to 4.30 p.m., showcasing Sri Lankan culture and heritage.

Title: Vesak celebrations in Ethiopia enhances awareness of Buddhism and Sri Lankan Buddhist culture
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka and the Sri Lankan community in Ethiopia hosted a vibrant lantern festival on May 5, 2023, at the official residence of the Sri Lankan Ambassador in Ethiopia to celebrate Vesak. The event aimed to raise awareness of Buddhism and Sri Lankan Buddhist culture in Ethiopia.

Title: New Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Hungary appointed
Summary: Ambassador Majintha Jayesinghe appointed László Marton as the new Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Hungary. Marton, a prominent entrepreneur, received the Commission of Appointment, marking his official role in diplomatic relations between the two countries.

Title: Consul General, Sandith Samarasinghe participates at the “Sri Lanka: The Rise of a Thriving Nation” organized by the Sri Lanka and Australia Chamber of Commerce
Summary: Consul General Sandith Samarasinghe presented Sri Lanka's roadmap for a Green Sri Lanka at the seminar "Sri Lanka: The Rise of a Thriving Nation" organized by the Sri Lanka and Australia Chamber of Commerce. The event highlighted Sri Lanka's efforts towards sustainable development and economic growth.

Title: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrates Vesak, 2023
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrated Vesak on May 5, 2023, in collaboration with the “Maha Mahinda Buddha Vihar” in Ulhasnagar, Maharashtra. The event was attended by the entire Mission staff and their family members, led b.

Title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe attends the Coronation of His Majesty King Charles III
Summary: President Ranil Wickremesinghe visited the UK from 4-7 May 2023 to attend the Coronation of His Majesty King Charles III. On 5 May, he also participated in the Commonwealth Leaders Event.

Title: Prof Maithree  Wickramasinghe, First Lady of Sri Lanka participates in Fireside Chat on cervical cancer
Summary: Prof Maithree Wickramasinghe, the First Lady of Sri Lanka, participated in a Fireside Chat on cervical cancer at the invitation of the Commonwealth Secretary-General, The Rt Hon Patricia Scotland. The event took place on the sidelines of the Commonwealth summit.

Title: Vesak Celebrations in Manila
Summary: The International Day of Vesak (Buddha Poornima) was celebrated in Manila with a two-day special commemorative event held on May 5 and 6, 2023, at the Official Residence and St. Giles Hotel Makati. The event marked a significant occasion for the community to honor and observe Vesak festivities.

Title: Sri Lankans in South Africa celebrate Sinhala Tamil New Year
Summary: Sri Lankans in South Africa celebrated the Sinhala Tamil New Year with their families in Johannesburg, Pretoria, Durban, and nearby cities on April 22, 2023, at Centurion City. The event was organized by a company.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organizes an awareness programme by the Labour Market Regulatory Authority
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organized an awareness programme on 03 May 2022, in collaboration with the Labour Market Regulatory Authority. The event aimed to enhance the understanding of procedures and services offered by the Authority among the Sri Lankan community in Bahrain.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi celebrates Vesak Festival in Karachi
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi celebrated the Vesak Festival in Karachi in collaboration with the local Sri Lankan community on May 5, 2023. The event included a religious program at the Consulate General to mark Vesak Day.

Title: Vesak celebrated in Brussels
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels celebrated Vesak, honoring the birth, enlightenment, and passing away of Gautama Buddha with the theme "Serenity of the Mind" at the Official Residence.

Title: Leading Sri Lankan Monks bring the message of Vesak, peace and harmony to Beijing
Summary: Leading Sri Lankan Monks conveyed the message of Vesak, peace, and harmony in Beijing during a grand celebration hosted by the Sri Lankan Embassy on 05 May. Approximately 500 Chinese and Sri Lankans participated, with the event showcasing the dedication of the Embassy staff and Chinese well-wishers.

Title: Sri Lankan Embassy in Washington D.C. celebrates Vesak 2023 at the White House
Summary: The Sri Lankan Embassy in Washington D.C. celebrated Vesak 2023 at the White House on Friday, 05 May 2023. The festival commemorates the birth, enlightenment, and passing of Lord Buddha in a special event.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy celebrates Vesak at Washington Buddhist Vihara and Chancery premises
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington celebrated Vesak at the Washington Buddhist Vihara and Chancery premises to honor the birth, enlightenment, and passing away of Lord Buddha. Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe and embassy staff participated in the event on May 5, 2023, marking this significant occasion.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan Celebrates Vesak
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan celebrated Vesak at the Chancery premises on May 5, 2023, in collaboration with all Sri Lankan communities. The key theme of the event was "Serenity of the Mind," emphasizing spiritual significance. The celebration aimed to promote peace and mindfulness among participants.

Title: Sri Lanka and Thailand join hands to celebrate International Day of Vesak at the UN in Geneva
Summary: Sri Lanka and Thailand collaborated to celebrate the International Day of Vesak at the UN in Geneva. The event was co-hosted by the Permanent Missions of both countries at the United Nations Office in Geneva. The commemorative event aimed to mark the significance of Vesak on an international platform.

Title: Vesak Celebrations at the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran celebrated Vesak Day at the Chancery premises in Tehran on May 5, 2023, under the theme of "the serenity of the mind." The event brought together the staff of the Mission and members of the Sri Lankan community to commemorate this important Buddhist festival.

Title: A spectacular Vesak Day commemoration at United Nations in Kenya adorned by a donation of one million plants and seedlings
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Nairobi, Kenya, and the Thai Embassy co-hosted a spectacular Vesak Day commemoration at the United Nations Office in Nairobi on May 5, 2023. The event was adorned by a donation of one million plants and seedlings, creating an inspiring ceremony.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in Maldives organises blood donation programme to mark Vesak
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Maldives organized a blood donation program on May 6, 2023, to commemorate Vesak. This event marks the second consecutive year that the Sri Lanka Mission has arranged such a program. The initiative aims to promote the spirit of giving and compassion during the Vesak celebrations.

Title: Commemoration of the International day of Vesak in Jakarta
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta commemorated the International Day of Vesak with a Dhamma Sermon themed "The Serenity of the Mind" on May 5, 2023. The sermon was delivered by Ven. from the Siddharta Temple of Indonesia, promoting peace and mindfulness.

Title: Vesak – 2023 Celebrations in Lebanon
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon & Syria celebrated Vesak on May 5, 2023, with the theme "the Serenity of the Mind" and the participation of the Sri Lankan community. The event took place at the Embassy premises.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda continues dialogue with the Principal Secretary to the Prime Minister of India
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in New Delhi, Milinda Moragoda, met with the Principal Secretary to the Prime Minister of India, Dr. Pramod Kumar Mishra, to continue their ongoing dialogue. The meeting aimed to strengthen bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Consular Mobile Service in Florence, Italy 30 April 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Italy held a Consular Mobile Service in Florence on April 30, 2023, offering consular assistance to the Sri Lankan community in Tuscany and Emilia Romagna regions. This service aimed to support Sri Lankan residents with their consular needs in the specified regions.

Title: Sri Lankan New Year Celebrated in Karachi
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate in Karachi and the Sri Lanka Community in Sindh province celebrated the Sinhala & Tamil New Year at the IQRA University premises on April 30, 2023. The event brought together members of the Sri Lankan community in Karachi to mark the traditional New Year festivities.

Title: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage meets Commander- in- Chief of Indonesian Armed Forces (C-in-C of TNI)
Summary: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage of Sri Lanka met with Admiral Yudo Margono, the Commander-in-Chief of the Indonesian Armed Forces, at the Armed Forces Headquarters in Jakarta on the 4th of March.

Title: 75th Independence Day Cricket Trophy-2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka, along with the Sri Lankan expatriate community in Oman, organized the 75th Independence Day Cricket Trophy-2023 as part of the yearlong special commemorative events.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi celebrates Sinhala and Tamil New Year – 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi celebrated the Sinhala and Tamil New Year on April 30, 2023, with the Sri Lankan community in the UAE. The traditional celebration was held at the Embassy premises and organized by the Embassy.

Title: James Alan Bennet appointed Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka for Surrey, British Columbia
Summary: James Alan Bennett has been appointed as the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka for Surrey, British Columbia. High Commissioner Harsha Kumara Navaratne ceremoniously handed over the Commission of Appointment on May 3, 2023. Bennett will now serve in this role representing Sri Lanka in the province.

Title: Ambassador Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage calls on Minister of Home Affairs of Indonesia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, met with the Minister of Home Affairs of Indonesia, Muhammad Tito Karnavian, on May 2, 2023. The meeting was a courtesy call between the two officials.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets the Chairman of Jindal Steel and Power Limited
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, engaged with Indian investors by meeting with Naveen Jindal, the Chairman of Jindal Steel and Power Limited. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries' business sectors.

Title: Asian Institute of Technology (AIT) in Thailand concludes an International Training Programme on “Modern Automotive Technology” for Academics of Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Asian Institute of Technology (AIT) in Thailand recently completed an International Training Programme on "Modern Automotive Technology" for academics from Sabaragamuwa University in Sri Lanka. The program was conducted under the Asian Development Bank's (ADB) Science and Technology Human Resource Development initiative. This initiative aimed to enhance the participants' knowledge and skills in the field of modern automotive technology.

Title: Sri Lanka takes the Presidency of the High-Level Committee on  South-South Cooperation
Summary: Sri Lanka's Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York, Mohan Pieris, has been appointed by acclamation to lead the 21st session of the High-Level Committee on South-South Cooperation. Sri Lanka now holds the Presidency of this important committee.

Title: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu conveys to Tehran based media that “Iran is among the top ten tourism source markets in March 2023 in Sri Lanka Tourism” and presents awards for top tourism stakeholders
Summary: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu informed Tehran-based media that Iran ranks among the top ten tourism source markets in Sri Lanka for March 2023. He also presented awards to key tourism stakeholders during the event organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran, in partnership with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau and the Association of Air Transport and Tourist Agencies in Iran.

Title: Eight Sri Lankans among the released crew of the detained vessel by Nigerian High Court
Summary: Eight Sri Lankans were among the crew members released by the Federal High Court of Nigeria in Port Harcourt on April 28, 2023. The vessel M/T Heroic Idun, detained over disputed oil smuggling allegations, was also released.

Title: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena awarded the Diplomat of the Year from Asia & Oceania by the DIPLOMAT Magazine
Summary: High Commissioner Saroja Sirisena was honored as the Diplomat of the Year from Asia & Oceania at the DIPLOMAT Magazine annual Awards Ceremony 2023 held at the Royal Over-Seas League on April 24, 2023. The prestigious award recognizes her outstanding diplomatic contributions in the region.

Title: Consul General Attends Eid Lunch hosted by Association of Progressive Muslims of Canada
Summary: Consul General Thushara Rodrigo attended the Eid Lunch hosted by the Association of Progressive Muslims of Canada (APMC) on April 26, 2023, at the Legislative Assembly of Ontario at Queen’s Park, Toronto. The event brought together members and guests to celebrate Eid.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets IndiGo co-founder Rahul Bhatia to discuss enhancing air connectivity  between Sri Lanka and India
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, held talks with IndiGo airline's co-founder and Managing Director Rahul Bhatia to discuss enhancing air connectivity between the two countries. This meeting is part of Moragoda's ongoing discussions with Indian investors and corporate leaders to strengthen bilateral ties in the aviation sector.

Title: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrates Sinhala and Tamil New Year 2023
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai, led by Consul General Dr. Valsan Vethody, celebrated the Sinhala and Tamil New Year 2023 at the DhammaGiri - Vipassana International Academy in Igatpuri on April 13. The event brought together the Mission staff for the festive occasion, promoting cultural exchange and unity.

Title: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the United Arab Emirates  meets the Minister of Tolerance of the UAE  HH Sheikh Nahayan bin Mabarak Al Nahyan,
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the United Arab Emirates, Udaya Indrarathna, met with the UAE Minister of Tolerance, HH Sheikh Nahayan bin Mabarak Al Nahyan, on March 22, 2023, at HH's palace for a celebration. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Tourism organizes a Promotional Road Show in Southern India
Summary: Sri Lanka Tourism, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai, conducted a Tourism Road Show in Southern India. The event kicked off in Chennai, Tamil Nadu on 24 April, showcasing Sri Lanka's attractions to Indian travelers.

Title: Illumination of the Australian National Monuments to celebrate 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka’s Independence -Winner of the Photographic Competition, Heshan Bandara
Summary: Heshan Bandara won the photographic competition held during the illumination of iconic Australian National Monuments in celebration of the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence. The event also marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence.

Title: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona declares open a centre to develop Chinese and Sri Lankan Traditional Medicine
