Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona inaugurated a center in Wudangshan to foster collaboration between Chinese and Sri Lankan Traditional Medicine practitioners. The event took place during a conference attended by TCM experts, highlighting Wudangshan's significance as a key center of the Dao.

Title: High Commission celebrates the Sri Lankan New Year with the British Sri Lankan community
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in London, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, celebrated the Sri Lankan New Year festival 2023 with the British Sri Lankan community on 22 April 2023 at the High Commission premises. The event brought together members of the community to mark the occasion in a festive atmosphere.

Title: Two photographs of Sri Lankan origin unveiled at the office of the State Minister of External Affairs and Culture of India to mark the 75th anniversary of Indo – Lanka diplomatic relations
Summary: To commemorate the 75th anniversary of Indo-Lanka diplomatic relations, two photographs of Sri Lankan origin were unveiled at the office of the State Minister of External Affairs and Culture of India. This event marks a significant milestone in the longstanding relationship between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu shares Iftar with children in  the Islamic Republic of Iran
Summary: Ambassador Wishwanath Aponsu of Sri Lanka and the Embassy staff shared an Iftar meal with children in the Islamic Republic of Iran on the last day of Ramazan. The event took place on 21 April 2023, marking the end of the Holy month.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai hosts ‘Iftar’
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai hosted an 'Iftar' function on April 21, 2023, at the Chancery premises. The event began with the breaking of the fast and included a recitation of verses from the Holy Quran. It was a gathering to mark the occasion of Iftar.

Title: ‘Welcome Back to Sri Lanka’ A tourism promotion workshop hosted in Brussels
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brussels hosted a workshop titled "Welcome Back to Sri Lanka" on April 20, 2023, at the Press Club in Brussels to promote tourism in the Belgian travel market. The event aimed to boost interest in visiting Sri Lanka among Belgian travelers.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy celebrates Avurudu
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka – China Economic, Education, and Cultural Association (SCEECA), celebrated "Beijing Soorya Mangalya" on April 16, 2023, at the Embassy following traditional customs. The event marked the Avurudu festivities in Beijing.

Title: Sri Lanka to explore areas of cooperation with Okinawa
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera visited Okinawa to explore cooperation opportunities, meeting with Governor Denny Tamaki in Naha. This marks the first official visit by a Sri Lankan envoy to Okinawa, aiming to establish fruitful links between the two regions.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets Indian Minister of Commerce and Industry to follow up on support for economic recovery through bilateral trade expansion
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with Indian Minister of Commerce and Industry, Shri Piyush Goyal, on April 20, 2023, in New Delhi. The meeting aimed to follow up on support for economic recovery through bilateral trade expansion.

Title: Venerable Samanthabadra Thero  visits the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai
Summary: Venerable Samanthabadra Thero visited the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai during a cultural tour and met with Dr. D Venkateshwaran on April 16, 2023. The meeting focused o.

Title: Celebration of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrated the Sinhala and Tamil New Year with the Sri Lankan community on April 15, 2023, at the Embassy premises. The event brought together staff and community members for a festive celebration.

Title: Advisory on fraudulent job offers in Thailand
Summary: The Sri Lanka Mission in Thailand has observed an increase in fraudulent job offers targeting Sri Lankan nationals, especially in the Information Technology (IT) sector. These offers are being made by dubious IT firms in Thailand. Sri Lankans are advised to be cautious when considering employment opportunities in Thailand.

Title: The High Commission of Sri Lanka hosts Iftar Dinner
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore hosted an iftar dinner at the Sri Lanka Residence on April 19, 2023, to show solidarity and respect for the religious and cultural traditions of Sri Lankan Muslims living there. The event aimed to foster unity and understanding among communities.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka in Jakarta participates at the 68th Anniversary of the Asia-Africa Conference
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, was a guest of honor at the 68th Anniversary of the Asia-Africa Conference on April 17, 2023, held at the Museum of Asia-Africa Conference in Bandung.

Title: Planting of Sacred Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi at Bai Dinh temple in Vietnam
Summary: The planting of the Sacred Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi at Bai Dinh temple in Vietnam was coordinated by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Vietnam, along with the Embassy of Vietnam in Colombo and relevant ministries from both countries. This event symbolizes the strong cultural and religious ties between Sri Lanka and Vietnam.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Turkiye interacts with the leaders of Antalya Province of Turkiye
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Turkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, visited Antalya Province to strengthen ties and partnerships with local leaders, alongside the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka. The visit aimed to enhance collaboration between Sri Lanka and Antalya Province.

Title: Sri Lankan Travel Agents participate in the Viet Nam International Travel Mart (VITM) for the first time
Summary: Sri Lankan travel agents participated in the Viet Nam International Travel Mart (VITM) for the first time, organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam. The event took place at the Hanoi International Exhibition Center (ICE), marking a significant milestone in promoting Sri Lanka's tourism industry.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Viet Nam hosts a Tourism Promotion Media Briefing
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Hanoi, in collaboration with Sri Lankan Tourism, organized a seminar to boost tourism from Vietnam to Sri Lanka. The event was well-attended by over 50 travel agents and media representatives, aiming to promote travel opportunities between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lankans in Karachi, Pakistan organize an Iftar
Summary: Sri Lankans in Karachi, Pakistan, organized an Iftar on 8 April 2022, with the Association of Sri Lankan Students in Pakistan (ASSP) Sindh Chapter and the Sri Lankan Community in Sindh, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi. The event brought together the Sri Lankan community in a celebration of unity and togetherness during the holy month of Ramadan.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrates Sinhala and Tamil New Year- 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrated Sinhala and Tamil New Year 2023 on April 15th. Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe and embassy staff marked the occasion with traditional ceremonies, including the lighting of lamps.

Title: State Minister of Finance Shehan Semasinghe led the Sri Lanka Delegation to the “10th Asia Pacific Forum on Sustainable Development” (10th APFSD) at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific, (UNESCAP) in Bangkok, Thailand
Summary: State Minister of Finance Shehan Semasinghe led the Sri Lanka Delegation to the 10th Asia Pacific Forum on Sustainable Development at the United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific in Bangkok, Thailand. The delegation participated in discussions on sustainable development goals and initiatives at the forum.

Title: Ethiopia celebrates Sinhala and Tamil New Year 2023
Summary: Ethiopia celebrated the Sinhala and Tamil New Year 2023 in collaboration with the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Addis Ababa. The event was organized for the Sri Lankan community residing in Ethiopia and the African Union Commission.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Ethiopia to organise Sinhala and Tamil New Year Festival 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Ethiopia will organize the Sinhala and Tamil New Year Festival 2023 in collaboration with Sri Lankan citizens. The event will take place in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, and aims to celebrate the cultural traditions of Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador Colombage calls on Indonesian Minister of Manpower
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, visited the Minister of Manpower of Indonesia, Ida Fauziyah, on April 11, 2023, to discuss mutual concerns. The meeting aimed to address current issues and strengthen bilateral cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador visits the AMF Permanent Secretariat in Tehran
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Iran, G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu, visited the Permanent Secretariat of the Asian Mayors Forum (AMF) in Tehran on April 10, 2023. During the visit, he engaged in a comprehensive discussion with the AMF Secretary General.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organizes an Ifthar
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organized an Ifthar with the Sri Lankan Muslim community on April 6, 2023, at the official residence of the Ambassador of Sri Lanka. The event commenced with the recitation of religious verses and brought together community members for a shared meal.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi hosts Iftar
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Abu Dhabi hosted an 'Iftar' for the community on April 8, 2023, at the Embassy premises to mark the holy month of Ramadan. This initiative was taken for the first time, bringing people together in the spirit of the occasion.

Title: Sri Lankan “Lion Beer” introduced to the Indian markets
Summary: Sri Lanka's renowned global brand "Lion Beer" has been introduced to the Indian market for the first time in history. This initiative was successfully unveiled by the Deputy High Commissioner of Sri Lanka in Southern India. The brand's presence in India marks a significant milestone for the company.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon celebrates Ifthar
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon celebrated Ifthar on April 6, 2023. Ambassador-designate Kapila Jayaweera hosted representatives of the Muslim community, business agents, Embassy staff, and other guests at the event. The celebration brought together a diverse group in a spirit of unity and community.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy informs French media that “Sri Lanka is vibrant and open for tourism”
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in France, along with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, held a media briefing in Paris on April 4, 2022, highlighting the country's vibrant tourism offerings. The event aimed to showcase Sri Lanka's attractions and promote it as a welcoming destination for tourists.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara donates to earthquake survivors for Ramadan
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara made a Ramadan donation to earthquake survivors in Ankara. The survivors arrived in Ankara following the devastating earthquakes on February 6. The donation aims to support those affected during the holy month of Ramadan.

Title: Ambassador Samarasinghe hosts Iftar Dinner
Summary: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe hosted an Iftar dinner at his residence on April 4, 2023, with Sri Lankan Muslims in attendance. The event commenced with the recitation of Iftar Dua, prayers, and breaking of the fast. It was a gathering to celebrate and observe the holy month of Ramadan.

Title: Consulate General in Milan conducts Community Outreach Programme in Genoa
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan conducted a mobile consular service in Genoa on 25 March 2023 as part of a community outreach programme. More than 100 Sri Lankans participated in the service to access consular assistance. The event aimed to provide support and services to the Sri Lankan community in Genoa.

Title: Ambassador Janaka Bandara meets with the Foreign Minister of Myanmar to discuss the rescue of stranded Sri Lankans
Summary: Ambassador Janaka Bandara of Sri Lanka met with Myanmar's Foreign Minister U Than Swe on March 30, 2023, in Nay Pyi Taw to discuss the rescue of stranded Sri Lankans. The meeting took place at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, focusing on cooperation for the safe return of the affected individuals.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka calls on Mayor of Çankaya District
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, met with the Mayor of Ankara’s Çankaya District, Alper Taşdelen, at the Çankaya Municipality on April 4, 2023. Alper Taşdelen serves as the mayor of the district.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka visits West Java Craft Council of Indonesia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, along with embassy officials, visited the West Java Craft Council of Indonesia on the 31st.

Title: Filipino Travel Agents visit Sri Lanka to Explore and Promote the Country as a Travel Destination
Summary: The Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau, in collaboration with the Embassy of Sri Lanka in the Philippines, organized a familiarization tour for nine Filipino tour operators and agents from March 29 to April 6. The purpose was to explore and promote Sri Lanka as a travel destination.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda addresses the Economic Advisory Council to the Prime Minister of India
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, addressed the Economic Advisory Council to the Prime Minister of India (EAC-PM) on April 5, 2023, at the invitation of its Chairman, Dr. Bibek Debroy. Moragoda's talk focused on economic cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Successful Mobile Consular Service conducted by Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne successfully conducted a mobile consular service for the Sri Lankan community on 02 April 2023, at a Sri Lankan New Year Festival in Dandenong, Victoria. The event provided essential consular services to attendees, enhancing community engagement and support.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Paris discusses cooperation between French-Sri Lankan community and home country
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Paris, represented by Ambassador Manisha Gunasekera, held a meeting with leaders of the Sri Lanka Association and senior representatives of the Sri Lankan community in France to discuss cooperation between the two communities. The meeting took place at the Sri Lanka Embassy in Paris.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels Hosts Iftar Dinner
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Brussels, Belgium, hosted an Iftar dinner on April 2, 2023, with the participation of the Sri Lankan Muslim community and other Sri Lankans of different faiths residing in Belgium. The event was held in reverence of the holy month of Ramadan.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta and JAAF organizes networking session for the apparel sector
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta, in partnership with the Joint Apparel Association Forum of Sri Lanka (JAAF), hosted a virtual networking session on March 27, 2023, aimed at fostering mutually beneficial opportunities for the apparel sector in both countries. The event sought to enhance collaboration and create a win-win situation for all involved stakeholders.

Title: New Sri Lankan Envoy meets with Australian Parliamentarian of Sri Lankan Origin
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to Australia, Chitranganee Wagiswara, met with Australian Federal Parliamentarian Cassandra Fernando, who is of Sri Lankan origin. During the meeting, the High Commissioner congratulated MP Cassandra Fernando on her recent election to the Federal Parliament.

Title: Sri Lanka tourism industry’s resurgence highlighted at ITB – 2023 in Berlin
Summary: The resurgence of Sri Lanka's tourism industry was highlighted at ITB 2023 in Berlin with the theme 'Open for Change'. The leading travel trade show returned to Berlin after a three-year hiatus due to the COVID-19 pandemic, showcasing the industry's recovery and readiness for visitors.

Title: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona visits the Skyworth, Zonergy and Huawei headquarters
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona of Sri Lanka visited the headquarters of Skyworth, Zonergy, and Huawei in Beijing. During the visit, he received a briefing from the senior management of Skyworth, a prominent manufacturer of electronics. The ambassador's visit aimed to strengthen bilateral ties and explore potential collaborations in the tech industry.

Title: M+ Software of Indonesia had a preliminary meeting with Sri Lankan ICT industry associations
Summary: M+ Software of Indonesia held a virtual meeting on 03 April 2023, organized by the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta in collaboration with the Export Development Board. The meeting aimed to connect M+ Software with Sri Lankan ICT industry associations, fostering potential collaborations and partnerships.

Title: Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran presented to the High Commissioner of Nigeria in New Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented a copy of the Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the High Commissioner of Nigeria in New Delhi, Ahmed Sule, on April 3. The presentation took place at the Nigerian High Commission in New Delhi.

Title: Gurukul Kurukshetra in Haryana and Sri Lanka to cooperate in natural farming
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, visited Gurukul Kurukshetra in Haryana on April 2, 2023, following an invitation from the Governor of Gujarat, Shri Acharya Devvrat. The visit aimed to foster cooperation between the two institutions in the field of natural farming.

Title: Ambassador Aponsu meets with the IOM Chief of Mission in Iran
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Iran, G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu, met with the Chief of Mission of the International Organization for Migration (IOM) in Iran, Lalini Veerassamy, on March 30, 2023. The meeting took place at the Sri Lankan Embassy.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta organizes an Ifthar gathering
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta recently held an Ifthar gathering in partnership with the Sri Lankan community in Indonesia on April 1, 2023. The event featured discussions on Islam, recitation of Dua, and breaking of the fast, bringing together attendees in a spirit of unity and celebration.

Title: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona Promotes Sri Lanka Tourism and Investment Opportunities at the Global Diplomats’ Chinese Cultural Night
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona chaired the 8th Global Diplomats’ Chinese Cultural Night 2023, promoting Sri Lanka's tourism and investment opportunities. The event took place at the Grand Ballroom of the China World Hotel.

Title: Sri Lankan delegation participates in ADB-WHO Study Tour to the Philippines
Summary: A Sri Lankan delegation participated in a study tour in the Philippines from March 22 to 24, 2023, organized by the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and World Health Organization (WHO). The visit aimed to enhance collaboration and knowledge-sharing between the countries.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets with the President of ISKCON Mumbai
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, on an official visit to Maharashtra, met with the President of the Mumbai center of the International Society for Krishna Consciousness (ISKCON). The meeting aimed to strengthen cultural ties between Sri Lanka and ISKCON Mumbai.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets with the Governor of Maharashtra
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with the Governor of Maharashtra, Shri Ramesh Bais, during his official visit to the state. The meeting took place in Mumbai at the Raj Bhavan on the 30th of the month. The discussion likely focused on strengthening bilateral relations between Sri Lanka and Maharashtra.

Title: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe visits the Boston Museum of Fine Arts
Summary: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe visited the Boston Museum of Fine Arts (MFA) on 24 March 2023. During the visit, he met with Museum Director Matthew Teitelbaum and the Chief of Curatorial Affairs and Conservation, Matsutaro Shoriki Chair. The ambassador's visit aimed to strengthen cultural ties between Sri Lanka and the museum.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka in Türkiye meets the President of the Ankara Chamber of Commerce
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka in Türkiye, S. Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, recently met with the President of the Ankara Chamber of Commerce at their headquarters. The meeting aimed to strengthen bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: High Commissioner Kananathan, Sri Lanka’s first envoy to Gabon presents Credentials in Libreville
Summary: High Commissioner Veluppillai Kananathan presented his credentials as Sri Lanka's first envoy to Gabon to President Ali Bongo Ondimba in Libreville. He will serve as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Gabonese Republic with residence in Kenya.

Title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe talks to Harvard University, USA
Summary: President Ranil Wickremesinghe spoke at Harvard University in the USA on Friday, March 24, 2023, at Boylston Hall in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The event took place at the Lakshmi Mittal and Family South Asia Institute, where the President engaged with faculty and students.

Title: Permanent Delegate of Sri Lanka to UNESCO presents Credentials to Director General UNESCO
Summary: Sri Lanka's Permanent Delegate to UNESCO, Manisha Gunasekera, presented her Letters of Credence to UNESCO Director General Audrey Azoulay. The presentation solidifies her official role representing Sri Lanka at the organization.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at the International Conference on Shanghai Cooperation Organization: “Reconnect-Rejuvenate” in New Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka took part in the "Reconnect-Rejuvenate" International Conference on the Shanghai Cooperation Organization in New Delhi on March 23-24, 2023. The two-day conference was organized by the Indian Council of World Affairs.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka presents credentials to the Captains Regent of the Republic of San Marino
Summary: Ambassador Jagath Wellawatte of Sri Lanka presented his Letters of Credence to the Captains Regent of San Marino, Maria Luisa Berti and Manuel Ciavatta, on March 22, 2023, at Palazzo Pubblico. This formal event signifies the official start of his diplomatic mission in San Marino.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta explores possible collaboration with Universitas Budi Luhur
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Prof. Jayanath Colombage, along with Embassy officials, visited Universitas Budi Luhur (UBL) on March 24 to explore potential collaboration opportunities. The visit aimed to strengthen ties between the Sri Lankan Embassy in Jakarta and UBL for future partnerships in education and other areas.

Title: High Commissioner Kananathan hosts the first Iftar Dinner in Nairobi
Summary: High Commissioner Kananathan hosted the first Iftar Dinner at the Sri Lanka High Commission in Nairobi on March 25, 2023, with the participation of Sri Lankan and Kenyan Muslims. The event marked a significant cultural exchange between the two communities in Nairobi.

Title: Sri Lanka Gem and Jewellery Exhibition held in Shanghai
Summary: The Sri Lanka Gem and Jewellery Exhibition took place at The St. Regis Hotel in Shanghai from March 22 to 23, 2023. The event featured Zam Gems Sri Lanka and was held under the patronage of the Sri Lanka Consulate General in Shanghai. It showcased a range of gemstones and jewelry from Sri Lanka to visitors in Shanghai.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda presents a copy of the Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Ambassador of Bahrain
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, Milinda Moragoda, presented a copy of the Sinhala translation of the Holy Quran to the Ambassador of Bahrain as part of his efforts to promote dialogue with Heads of Mission of Islamic countries. This gesture aims to strengthen cultural understanding and diplomatic relations between the two nations.

Title: Sri Lanka joins the International Day of Forests Event in Türkiye in memory of Earthquake Victims
Summary: Sri Lanka's Embassy in Türkiye participated in a tree planting event in Ankara named "Earthquake Martyrs Forest 2023" to honor the recent earthquake victims. The event was part of the International Day of Forests, with various countries and organizations coming together to pay tribute.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets Finance Minister Sitharaman to discuss the way forward in bilateral economic cooperation
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Finance Minister, Nirmala Sitharaman, in New Delhi on 22 March 2023 to discuss bilateral economic cooperation. The meeting aimed to chart the way forward for enhancing economic ties between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye calls on the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Türkiye
Summary: Ambassador Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake met with Türkiye's Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu on March 21, 2023. The Minister commended the Embassy of Sri Lanka for its leadership role.

Title: Sri Lankan Embassy in Washington DC Facilitates approximately USD 27 million in Medical Aid
Summary: The Sri Lankan Embassy in Washington DC, in partnership with American humanitarian donor organizations, has facilitated around USD 27 million in medical aid, providing free medicine and supplies. This achievement marks a significant milestone in supporting healthcare initiatives.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrates International Women’s Day
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrated International Women’s Day on March 10, 2023, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Women’s Association in Bahrain at the Embassy premises. The event was attended by the Ambassador designate to Bahrain and highlighted the achievements and contributions of women.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta celebrates International Women’s Day
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta celebrated International Women’s Day with a program themed "The role of women for a sustainable tomorrow" on March 17, 2023. The event included members from Indonesia and was part of the embassy's public diplomacy initiatives.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in the Republic of Seychelles hosts a Diplomatic Reception on the Occasion of the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in the Republic of Seychelles hosted a Diplomatic Reception at the Savoy Resort & Spa on February 28, 2023, to celebrate the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka. Diplomatic guests gathered to mark this significant occasion.

Title: Presentation of Letters of Credence – Australia
Summary: Chitranganee Wagiswara, the High Commissioner to the Commonwealth of Australia, presented her Letters of Credence to Governor General AC DSC (Retd.) David Hurley on March 16, 2023, at the Government House in Canberra. This formal event signifies the official commencement of her diplomatic duties in Australia.

Title: External Affairs Minister Jaishankar inaugurates “Geoffrey Bawa:It is Essential To be There” Exhibition to mark 75 years of Indo-Lanka Diplomatic Relations
Summary: Indian Minister of External Affairs Dr. S. Jaishankar inaugurated the Sri Lankan exhibition "Geoffrey Bawa: It is Essential To be There" at the National Gallery of Modern Art in New Delhi on 17 March to commemorate 75 years of Indo-Lanka Diplomatic Relations. The exhibition showcases the work of renowned Sri Lankan architect Geoffrey Bawa.

Title: Ambassador Samarasinghe meets with Sri Lankan Students
Summary: Ambassador Samarasinghe met with a group of Sri Lankan students from St. Thomas Preparatory School, Colombo at the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington DC on 15 March 2023. The meeting was part of an educational program organized by Green Contributor Inc. to facilitate interactions between students and diplomats.

Title: Ambassador Samarasinghe Congratulates Sri Lanka’s Fulbright TEA Participant
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador in the United States, Mahinda Samarasinghe, congratulated Supipi Fernando, the sole candidate selected to successfully complete the Fulbright Teaching Excellence and Achievement Program (TEA).

Title: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona, Guest Speaker at the China International Gems and Jewellery Exhibition, Beijing
Summary: Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona was a guest speaker at the China International Gems and Jewellery Exhibition in Beijing on March 16, 2023. The event was attended by various dignitaries, including a former Minister.

Title: Representatives from the Recruiting Agents Association (RAA) discuss ways to increase  job opportunities for Sri Lankans
Summary: Representatives from the Recruiting Agents Association (RAA) in Jordan met with Ambassador J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekara at the Embassy on 14 March 2023 to discuss increasing job opportunities for Sri Lankans. They explored ways to promote employment prospects and enhance opportunities for the country's workforce.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in New York supports Craft as a medium for peace building
Summary: The Sri Lanka Mission in New York, in collaboration with the Association of War Affected Women, supports craft as a medium for peace building at the 67th session of the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women. This initiative aims to promote peace through creative expression and empowerment.

Title: “Ceylon Tea” showcased at FOODEX Japan 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka Tea Board, supported by the Sri Lanka Embassy in Japan, presented "Ceylon Tea" at FOODEX Japan 2023 in Tokyo. This exhibition is a prominent event in the food and beverage industry.

Title: Indonesian tour operators keen on Sri Lanka
Summary: Indonesian tour operators showed interest in Sri Lanka as the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta promoted tourism during Sirul’s Anniversary celebration on March 11, 2023, at the Grand Sahid Jaya Hotel in Indonesia. Approximately 100 Indonesian tour operators participated in the event, indicating a growing enthusiasm for travel to Sri Lanka.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain organizes Sri Lanka EXPO: The Trade, Tourism, Culture and Food Exhibition on 09 March 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain, in collaboration with the Export Development Board of Sri Lanka, organized the "Sri Lanka Expo" Trade, Tourism, Culture, and Food Exhibition on 09 March 2023 at the Thai M. Visitors had the opportunity to explore various aspects of Sri Lankan trade, tourism, culture, and food during the event.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at the “My Karachi – Oasis of Harmony Exhibition”
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the 18th My Karachi - Oasis of Harmony Exhibition from March 3 to 5, 2023, at the Karachi Expo Center in Pakistan. The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Karachi organized the country's participation in the event. It aimed to showcase Sri Lanka's culture and strengthen ties between the two nations.

Title: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry participates in Commonwealth Day Commemorative Events
Summary: Foreign Minister Ali Sabry, currently on an official visit to the United Kingdom for the 22nd Commonwealth Foreign Ministers Meeting, participated in various events marking Commonwealth Day on March 13.

Title: Establishment of Sri Lanka – China Economic, Educational and Cultural Association to Coordinate Overseas Sri Lankan Affairs in China
Summary: The Sri Lanka-China Economic, Educational, and Cultural Association was established on March 11, 2023, during a meeting led by Ambassador Dr. Palitha Kohona at the Embassy. The association aims to coordinate overseas Sri Lankan affairs in China, involving businessmen, entrepreneurs, and professionals.

Title: Sri Lanka Film Festival – 10-11 March 2023 at Oldham Theatre, Singapore
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore, in partnership with the Asian Film Archive, will host the Sri Lanka Film Festival on 10-11 March 2023 at Oldham Theatre in Singapore. The festival will showcase internationally acclaimed Sri Lankan films as part of a promotional event.

Title: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai organises a Sri Lankan Food Festival and Cultural Programme
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai organized a one-week Sri Lankan Food Festival and Cultural Programme in collaboration with JW Marriott, Juhu, Mumbai, starting on 24 February 2023. The event featured a showcase of Sri Lankan cuisine and cultural performances, providing a unique experience for attendees.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the 6th Periodic Review under the ICCPR in Geneva
Summary: Sri Lanka took part in its 6th Periodic Review under the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (ICCPR) in Geneva on March 8 and 9, 2023. The Review was conducted in a hybrid format over three 2-hour sessions. Sri Lanka's participation in the review demonstrates its commitment to upholding civil and political rights.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets the Governor of Madhya Pradesh
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with Madhya Pradesh Governor Shri Mangubhai C. Patel during his official visit to the state on March 10, 2023, in Bhopal. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two regions.

Title: Sri Lanka celebrates International Women’s Day at the United Nations Office at Vienna
Summary: Sri Lanka celebrated International Women’s Day at the United Nations Office in Vienna on March 8, 2023. The event was organized by the Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in collaboration with the United Nations Women’s Guild (UNWG) at the Vienna International Center.

Title: Ambassador Samarasinghe addresses prestigious Cosmos Club in Washington DC on 75 years of SL – US relations.
Summary: Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe spoke at the Cosmos Club in Washington D.C. on March 6, 2023, addressing the 75-year partnership between Sri Lanka and the United States. The event celebrated the longstanding relations between the two countries.

Title: New Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan Presents Credentials to His Majesty King Abdullah ll Ibn Al Hussein
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan, J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekara, presented her credentials to His Majesty King Abdullah II Ibn Al Hussein of Jordan at the Basman Palace on March 8, 2023.

Title: Sri Lanka successfully participates at the 56th Diplomatic Red Cross Bazaar in Bangkok
Summary: Sri Lanka successfully participated in the 56th Diplomatic Red Cross Bazaar in Bangkok. The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka collaborated with the National Crafts Council, Sri Lanka Export Development Board, Spices and Allied Products Marketing Board, and Industrial Development Board for the event. Sri Lanka showcased its products at the bazaar to promote its crafts and industries.

Title: Six Sri Lankan Theros conferred with Honorary Religious Titles by the Government of Myanmar
Summary: Six Sri Lankan Theros have been honored with the titles "Abhidhaja Maha Rattha Guru" and "Aggamahapanditha" by the Government of Myanmar. Among them is the Most Venerable Prof. Kumburugamuwa Vajira Maha Thero.

Title: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera visits United Nations Interim Force in Lebanon (UNIFIL)
Summary: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera visited the United Nations Interim Force in Lebanon on March 7, 2023, where he met with Head of Mission and Force Commander Major General Aroldo LAZARO. The meeting aimed to strengthen diplomatic ties and cooperation between the ambassador and UNIFIL.

Title: Korean Media Institutions to promote Sri Lanka’s tourism destinations
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Republic of Korea, Savitri Panabokke, met with representatives of six Korean media institutions on March 7, 2023. During the meeting, the Ambassador and staff briefed the Korean media personnel on promoting Sri Lanka's tourism destinations. This initiative aims to boost awareness and interest in Sri Lanka among Korean audiences.

Title: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera calls on Prime Minister of Lebanon
Summary: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera met with Prime Minister of Lebanon Najib Mikati at Grand Serail in Beirut on 08 March 2023. During the meeting, Ambassador-Designate Jayaweera briefed the Prime Minister on relevant matters. The visit aimed to strengthen diplomatic relations between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye calls on the Chairman of Sri Lanka – Türkiye Parliamentary Friendship Association
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, recently met with Ahmet Hamdi Çamlı, the Chairman of the Sri Lanka – Türkiye Parliamentary Friendship Association, at the National Assembly in Ankara.

Title: South Korean Non-Governmental organization donates essential medical equipment to Sri Lanka
Summary: A South Korean Non-Governmental organization, Human Earth and the Med, donated essential medical equipment worth over Rs. 13 million to Sri Lanka. The equipment was officially handed over to the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Republic of Korea, Savitri Panabokke, on 08 March 2023.

Title: Sri Lanka showcases trade, tourism and investment opportunities in Dhaka
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Dhaka, along with the Sri Lankan expatriate community and associations, hosted an evening reception on March 7, 2023, at the Dhaka Sheraton to highlight trade, investment, and tourism opportunities. The event aimed to showcase the potential for collaboration and growth between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh.

Title: Enthusiastic Response to Tourism Promotion Event held at the Sri Lanka Embassy in China
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Beijing, China hosted a successful tourism promotion event attended by around 100 tour operators, agencies, service providers, media, and government representatives. The event received an enthusiastic response, showcasing the interest in Sri Lanka's tourism offerings.

Title: Sri Lanka showcased as “Asia’s Best Wildlife & Adventure Tourism Destination” at Canberra Multicultural Festival 2023
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Canberra showcased Sri Lanka as "Asia’s Best Wildlife & Adventure Tourism Destination" at the Annual Multicultural Festival 2023 organized by the ACT government. This event was part of the Mission's tourism promotion activities, highlighting Sri Lanka's attractions to visitors in Canberra.

Title: Sri Lanka Participates in UNESCO International Mother Language Day Celebration in South Africa
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Pretoria joined the UNESCO International Mother Language Day Celebrations hosted by the South Asian High Commissions on February 25, 2023, in South Africa. The event aimed to commemorate linguistic diversity and promote multilingualism.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador in Türkiye meets President of Ankara Chamber of Industry
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Türkiye, S. Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, recently met with the President of the Ankara Chamber of Industry, Seyit Ardıç, and the Secretary General, Yavuz Cabbar, on May 1st. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties between Sri Lanka and Ankara's industrial sector.

Title: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera meets Mayor of Hamamatsu City in Shizuoka Prefecture to promote Economic Cooperation
Summary: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera visited Hamamatsu City in Shizuoka Prefecture to promote economic cooperation. During the visit on February 24, 2023, he met with Mayor Yasutomo Suzuki to discuss strengthening cooperation between their regions.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador discusses cooperation on climate change with ROK Deputy Minister of Climate Diplomacy
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to the Republic of Korea, Savitri Panabokke, held discussions with Ambassador and Deputy Minister for Climate Diplomacy, Hyoeun Jenny Kim, on March 2. They focused on enhancing cooperation on climate change initiatives between the two countries.

Title: Seminar on “Sri Lanka’s Reformist Journey to Greater Economic Development”
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo, in collaboration with Lalaka Silva, President of Ernest Trading Ltd, and the Hamamatsu Chamber of Commerce, organized a seminar on "Sri Lanka’s Reformist Journey to Greater Economic Development." The event aimed to highlight Sri Lanka's efforts towards economic development and foster business opportunities between Sri Lanka and Japan.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in New York hosts first annual World Seagrass Day event
Summary: The Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in New York hosted a virtual event to mark the inaugural World Seagrass Day on March 1, 2023. This special day was established through a General Assembly resolution. The event aimed to raise awareness about the importance of seagrass ecosystems.

Title: Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to France assumes duties
Summary: Manisha Gunasekera, the newly appointed Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to France and Permanent Delegate to UNESCO, has officially started her duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Paris on February 27.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy organizes Awareness Program on Human Trafficking
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Jordan organized an awareness program on human trafficking on February 24, 2023, with active participation from the Sri Lankan community. The program aimed to support anti-human trafficking efforts and protect individuals from exploitation.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka pays a courtesy call on Minister of Foreign Affairs of Indonesia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, visited the Indonesian Foreign Ministry on 21 February 2023 to meet with Minister of Foreign Affairs Retno Marsudi. During the courtesy call, he expressed gratitude and discussed bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka-Luxembourg  Diplomatic Relations Celebrated in Luxembourg
Summary: Luxembourg celebrated the 75th anniversary of Sri Lanka with a diplomatic reception, marking the first such event since the establishment of diplomatic relations in 1972. The reception in Luxembourg commemorated the milestone in the bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Common Contribution by the Diplomatic Corps based in Ankara
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka, along with Ambassadors of Algeria, Djibouti, Malta, Montenegro, and New Zealand, handed over a joint contribution of 123,500 Turkish Lira from the diplomatic corps in Ankara.

Title: Sri Lanka targets growing European market for Organic Food at BIOFACH 2023 in Germany
Summary: Sri Lanka aimed to tap into the growing European organic food market at BIOFACH 2023 in Germany. The delegation participated in the world's largest annual organic food products trade show held from 14-17 February 2023 in Nuremberg, Germany.

Title: Ambassador Asirwatham meets Vice President of European Investment Bank in Luxembourg
Summary: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Belgium, Luxembourg, and Head of Mission to the European Union Grace Asirwatham met with Vice President of the European Investment Bank (EIB) Kris Peeters in Luxembourg on 20 February. The meeting aimed to discuss potential collaborations and partnerships between Sri Lanka and the EIB.

Title: Travel, Media and Influencer Gathering with Sri Lanka Embassy in Jakarta
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta, in partnership with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB), hosted a tourism promotional event titled "Travel, Media & Influencer Gathering with Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka Participates in the 13th Governing Board Meeting of  Regional Centre on Urban Water Management (RCUWM)
Summary: Sri Lanka's delegation, led by Ambassador G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu, participated in the 13th Governing Board Meeting of the Regional Centre on Urban Water Management (RCUWM) under UNESCO's auspices. The meeting aimed to discuss and address urban water management challenges in the region.

Title: Stassen Tea launched in Vienna
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Vienna launched Stassen Tea at the renowned tea house Haas & Haas during the 75th Anniversary of Independence Day commemoration. This event introduced Ceylon Tea by Stassen to Vienna, showcasing the rich tea culture of Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador-designate in Lebanon Kapila Jayaweera calls on His Eminence Cardinal of Lebanon
Summary: Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka in Lebanon, Kapila Jayaweera, visited His Eminence Patriarch Cardinal Bechara Boutros Al Rahi, the Patriarch of Maronites in Lebanon, at the Seat of the Maronite Patriarch. The visit was a courtesy call to strengthen diplomatic ties between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka Consul General in Mumbai discusses collaboration with IIT Bombay
Summary: Sri Lanka's Consul General in Mumbai, Dr. Valsan Vethody, met with the Dean of IIT Bombay to explore potential collaboration between IIT and universities in Sri Lanka. The meeting aimed to discuss opportunities for partnership and cooperation in the field of education.

Title: Sri Lanka attends Mother Language Day Celebrations 2023 at UNESCO
Summary: Sri Lanka's Permanent Delegation to UNESCO joined the International Mother Languages Day 2023 celebration hosted by Bangladesh's Permanent Delegation, aligning with UNESCO's theme "Safeguard." The event aimed to promote linguistic diversity and multilingualism.

Title: Australia – Sri Lanka Parliamentary Friendship Group to be re-launched
Summary: The Australia-Sri Lanka Parliamentary Friendship Group is set to be re-launched, as Acting High Commissioner Chamari Rodrigo met with Speaker Milton Dick at the Federal Parliament. During the meeting, Rodrigo expressed gratitude to the Australian government for their support.

Title: Minister of Tourism and Lands Harin Fernando elaborates on plans to reinvigorate the Sri Lankan Tourism Industry
Summary: Minister of Tourism and Lands Harin Fernando detailed plans to revitalize the Sri Lankan Tourism Industry at the Milano BIT 2023 International Tourism Exchange. The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Milan hosted a networking session with the Minister for tour operators and travel industry representatives. This initiative aims to boost tourism in Sri Lanka through collaboration and strategic efforts.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador to Iran visits Iran University of Medical Sciences
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Iran, G.M.V. Wishwanath Aponsu, visited the Iran University of Medical Sciences on February 2, 2023, to discuss potential academic collaborations and partnerships. The visit aimed to explore opportunities for cooperation between the two countries in the field of medical education.

Title: Sri Lanka-Netherlands Air Services Agreement to provide stronger platform for connectivity, tourism and business
Summary: The Sri Lanka-Netherlands Air Services Agreement signed in The Hague on February 22, 2023, will enhance connectivity, boosting tourism and business opportunities between the two countries. This agreement aims to strengthen the platform for increased air travel and collaboration.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador meets Director General for Foreign Relations at Türkiye Energy and Natural Resources Ministry
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake met with Türkiye's Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources' Director General for Foreign Relations, Öztürk Selvitop, to discuss mutual interests.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Rome celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Rome, in collaboration with the Sri Lankan community, celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on February 4, 2023, at the Embassy premises. The event marked a significant milestone in the country's history and was attended by members of the community and officials.

Title: Sri Lanka commemorates the 75th Anniversary of Independence in Vienna
Summary: Sri Lanka commemorated its 75th Anniversary of Independence in Vienna with a diplomatic reception at the Rathaus Wien on February 13, 2023. The event was hosted by the Embassy and attended by dignitaries, including the First President of the Parliament of the Province.

Title: ​Ambassador of Sri Lanka presents credentials to the President of the Republic of Indonesia
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Indonesia, Admiral Professor Jayanath Colombage, presented his credentials to President Joko Widodo of Indonesia on February 20, 2023, at the Istana Merdeka, the Presidential Palace.

Title: ​Iconic Australian National Monuments illuminated for Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission, in collaboration with the Australian government, illuminated iconic Australian national monuments in the colors of the Sri Lankan national flag to commemorate the 75th Anniversary. This gesture symbolized solidarity and friendship between the two nations.

Title: Education Minister attends the World Copernican Congress in Torun, Poland
Summary: Education Minister Dr. Susil Premajayantha attended the World Copernican Congress in Torun, Poland from 19 to 21 February 2023. He was invited by the Minister of Education and Science of Poland, Przemysła.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador-designate calls on Foreign Minister of Bahrain
Summary: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador-designate Reethisri Wijeratne Mendis met with Bahrain's Foreign Minister Dr. Abdullatif bin Rashid Al Zayani on February 6, 2022. During the meeting, Mendis presented her Credentials to the Minister.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka visits Adana, the logistics hub for mobilizing assistance to earthquake affected areas of Türkiye
Summary: Sri Lankan Ambassador to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, visited Adana on February 16, 2023, to receive the first donation from the government of Sri Lanka to Türkiye. The donation consisted of 1500kg of Ceylon Tea, aimed at supporting earthquake-affected areas in Türkiye.

Title: ​​Sri Lanka Consul General in Mumbai addresses College Students
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai was the Chief Guest at the annual event 'Kshitij' at Ramniranjan Jhunjhunwala College of Arts, Science, and Commerce on February 11, 2023. The college event provided an opportunity for the Consul General to address the students.

Title: Sri Lanka participates in the Milano BIT 2023,  International Tourism Exchange
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the Milano BIT 2023 International Tourism Exchange after receiving a fully hosted invitation from the Expo 2030 Roma Committee Director General Giuseppe Scognamiglio.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in London commemorates the 75th Anniversary of Independence with a series of events
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in London celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Independence with a series of events. This year also marks the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the UK.

Title: Ambassador Udaya Indraratna Presents Credentials to the UAE Vice President, Prime Minister and the Dubai Ruler
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the United Arab Emirates, Udaya Indrarathna, presented his credentials to the UAE Vice President, Prime Minister, and Dubai Ruler, His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum on February 6, 2023.

Title: British Leaders and the Diplomatic Community celebrate Sri Lanka’s 75th Independence
Summary: British leaders and the Diplomatic Community celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Independence at a reception in London, organized by the High Commission of Sri Lanka. The event's Chief Guest was the Speaker of the House of Commons, The Right Sir Lindsay Hoyle MP.

Title: High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore commemorates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Independence on February 4 and 6, 2023. The event included high-level representatives from the Singaporean government and diplomats.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate in Salzburg celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka in Salzburg, Austria, in collaboration with the Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Austria, hosted an event to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence. The event marked a significant milestone in honoring Sri Lanka's independence.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate in Innsbruck celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka in Innsbruck, Austria, in collaboration with the Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Austria, organized an event to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence. The event took place on the 1st of February, marking a significant milestone for Sri Lanka.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate in Graz celebrates 75th Anniversary of  Independence of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Honorary Consulate of Sri Lanka in Styria & Carinthia in Austria celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on February 8, 2023. The event was organized by the Honorary Consul of Sri Lanka in Styria.

Title: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera calls on Speaker of Parliament in Lebanon
Summary: Ambassador-Designate Kapila Jayaweera met with Speaker of the Parliament of Lebanon Nabih Berri on February 14, 2023. During the meeting, Jayaweera provided insights into the history of Sri Lanka's parliament.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai Marks 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai celebrated the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka with a reception at Rajindra Hall, Hotel ITC Grand Cho on February 10, 2023.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets Finance Minister of India ahead of G20 Finance Ministers’ Meeting
Summary: High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's Finance and Corporate Affairs Minister, Nirmala Sitharaman, on February 14, 2023, at the Ministry of Finance in New Delhi. The meeting took place ahead of the G20 Finance Ministers’ Meeting.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets Indian Minister of Commerce and Industry; discusses support for economic recovery through bilateral trade expansion
Summary: High Commissioner Milinda Moragoda met with Indian Minister of Commerce and Industry, Shri Piyush Goyal, on February 14, 2023, to discuss supporting economic recovery through bilateral trade expansion, as part of ongoing discussions with key Union Ministers of India on Sri Lanka's economic revival efforts.

Title: Representative Office of Sri Lanka in Palestine celebrates 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Representative Office of Sri Lanka in Palestine celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day on February 4, 2023, at Caesar Hotel in Ramallah. The event was presided over by Representative Nawalage Bennet Cooray.

Title: Sri Lanka Participates in the 16th Tehran International Exhibition of Tourism and Related Industries
Summary: Sri Lanka participated in the 16th Tehran International Exhibition of Tourism and Related Industries with the support of the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Iran, the Association of Air Transport & Tourism Agencies of Iran, and the Sri Lanka Tea Board. The event was successfully organized to showcase Sri Lanka's tourism offerings and strengthen international partnerships in the industry.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia celebrates 75th Anniversary of the Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Malaysia marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on February 4, 2023, with a flag hoisting ceremony at its premises. The event included the participation of officials and dignitaries.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in the Islamic Republic of Iran conducts Ceylon Tea and Trade Exhibition in Tehran
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Iran, along with the Sri Lanka Tea Board and Tehran's business community, organized a successful Ceylon Tea and Trade Exhibition at its chancery premises in Tehran. The event aimed to promote Ceylon tea and enhance trade relations between the two countries.

Title: Celebration of 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka in Toronto
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Toronto celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on February 4, 2023, with the participation of Sri Lankan-Canadians residing in Ontario. The event marked a significant milestone in the country's history and brought together the community in Toronto to commemorate the occasion.

Title: Government of Brazil assures support to Sri Lanka to achieve Political and Economic Stability
Summary: The Brazilian government, led by President Lula de Silva, has pledged support to Sri Lanka in attaining political and economic stability. This commitment was confirmed by the Secretary for Asia and the Pacific at the Brazilian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Title: 75th Anniversary of Independence Day commemorated in Ottawa
Summary: High Commissioner Harsha Kumara Navaratna and the staff of the Sri Lanka High Commission in Ottawa celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on February 4, 2023. The event was commemorated with a ceremony.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in Kuwait hosts Diplomatic Reception to mark  75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Kuwait hosted a diplomatic reception and cultural show at the Hyatt Regency Hotel to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Independence on February 8, 2023. The event was attended by the Kuwaiti Minister of Public Works.

Title: HEART TO HEART INTERNATIONAL DONATES USD 6.9 MILLION WORTH OF LIFE SAVING CANCER TREATMENT MEDICINES AND IMMUNOSUPPRESSANTS TO THE PEOPLE OF SRI LANKA
Summary: Heart to Heart International has donated $6.9 million worth of life-saving cancer treatment medicines and immunosuppressants to the people of Sri Lanka. The donation was made under the guidance of His Excellency Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe, as announced in a joint press release by the Embassy of Sri Lanka, Washington D.C., and Heart to Heart International. This generous contribution aims to provide essential medical support to those in need in Sri Lanka.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda interacts with Defence Advisers concurrently accredited to Sri Lanka
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, engaged in an interactive session with Defence Advisers concurrently accredited to Sri Lanka in New Delhi. This initiative aims to strengthen engagement with the accredited Missions and enhance cooperation in defense matters.

Title: Sri Lanka’s 75th Anniversary of Independence celebrated in France
Summary: Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence was celebrated in France at the Huatian Chinagora Hotel in Paris on 04 February 2023. The event began with the hoisting of the National Flag by the Chargé d'Affaires.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Guangzhou Celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Guangzhou celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Independence with a solemn ceremony on 04 February 2023. The event was attended by the Sri Lankan community and friends, marking a significant milestone for the consulate.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Milan commemorates 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Milan celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence with a flag hoisting ceremony attended by the local Sri Lankan community. The event took place at the Consulate General in Milan.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Havana celebrates  the 75th anniversary of the Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Havana celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence with a diplomatic reception and dinner attended by approximately 100 guests, including Cuban dignitaries.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrates  75th Independence Day
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th National Independence Day on February 4, 2023, at the consulate premises. The event was attended by officers from the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau and several other dignitaries.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Abu Dhabi Celebrates 75th Independence Day
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Abu Dhabi celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka’s Independence with a flag hoisting ceremony on February 4, 2023. The event also included a diplomatic reception at the Embassy premises.

Title: Sri Lanka Ambassador-Designate meets IOM Chief of Mission in Beirut
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador-Designate to Lebanon, Kapila Jayaweera, met with the Chief of Mission of the International Organization for Migration (IOM), Mathieu Luciano, in Beirut, Lebanon on February 9, 2023. The meeting aimed to discuss cooperation and mutual interests between Sri Lanka and the IOM in Lebanon.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets State Minister of External Affairs and Culture of India to discuss Geoffrey Bawa Exhibition in Delhi
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's State Minister of External Affairs and Culture, Meenakshi Lekhi, on February 7 to discuss the upcoming Geoffrey Bawa Exhibition in Delhi. Moragoda briefed Lekhi on the planned activities for the exhibition celebration.

Title: New Zealand Foreign Minister and Sri Lankan High Commissioner in New Delhi meet to discuss further cooperation
Summary: New Zealand's Foreign Minister met with the Sri Lankan High Commissioner in New Delhi to discuss enhancing cooperation between the two countries. The discussions focused on strengthening ties and exploring opportunities for collaboration.

Title: High Commission in New Delhi launches a Sinhala translation of Jairam Ramesh’s ‘The Light of Asia’ as it celebrates the 75th Independence Day
Summary: The High Commission in New Delhi launched a Sinhala translation of Jairam Ramesh’s book "The Light of Asia" to mark the 75th Independence Day celebrations. The translated version is titled "Budusiritha Lowata Genagiya Maha Kavyaya; Asiyawe Alokaya.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Pretoria organizes austere event to mark 75th Independence Day
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Pretoria, South Africa organized a solemn event to celebrate the 75th Independence Day with the Sri Lankan community and well-wishers. The event took place at the High Commission, bringing together members to mark this significant milestone.

Title: Celebration of 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka’s Independence in Doha, Qatar
Summary: The 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka’s Independence was celebrated in Doha, Qatar with a flag hoisting ceremony at the Sri Lanka Embassy on 04 February 2023, attended by the Sri Lankan community in Qatar. The event marked a significant milestone in Sri Lanka's history and showcased unity and patriotism among Sri Lankans living in Qatar.

Title: Flag Hoisting Ceremony at the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Muscat organized a flag hoisting ceremony to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on 4 February 2023. The event took place at the Embassy premises in Muscat.

Title: The National Chamber of Commerce (NCCSL) signs a MoU with the Association of Commerce, Industries and Service of the State of Goiás (ACIEG) in Brazil
Summary: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Association of Commerce, Industries, and Services of the State of Goiás (ACIEG) in Brazil. This agreement was facilitated to enhance cooperation between the two organizations.

Title: Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs Vijavat Isarabhakdi of the Kingdom of Thailand inaugurates Historic Occasion of Celebrations of the 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka at the Siam Society under Royal Patronage in Bangkok on 04th February 2023
Summary: Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of Thailand, Vijavat Isarabhakdi, was the Chief Guest at the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence celebration in Bangkok. The event took place at the Siam Society under Royal Patronage on February 4th, 2023.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai Celebrates 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai marked the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka on February 4, 2023, at the chancery premises. Mission staff participated in official celebrations and offered a heeld.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Indonesia celebrates the 75th Anniversary of Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Indonesia marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence Day on February 4, 2023, at the Embassy premises. The event was attended by the Sri Lankan community and friends of Sri Lanka, celebrating the milestone occasion.

Title: Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka and 75 Years of Diplomatic Relations with Pakistan
Summary: The Sri Lanka Consulate General in Karachi celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence and 75 Years of Diplomatic Relations with Pakistan by hosting a diplomatic reception. The event marked the longstanding relationship between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka Presents Credentials to the Federal President of Germany
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador to Germany, Varuni Muthukumarana, presented her credentials to Federal President Frank-Walter Steinmeier at Bellevue Castle in Berlin on February 8, 2023. This formal ceremony signifies the official start of her diplomatic mission in Germany.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Iran celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Iran marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence with a celebration themed "Namo Namo Matha-Let’s Leap towards the Centenary" at its premises in Tehran on February 4, 2022.

Title: Sri Lanka’s 75th Independence Day commemorated in Shanghai
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Shanghai marked Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day on February 4, 2023, at its premises with the presence of the Consul General of Sri Lanka to Shanghai. The event commemorated the significant milestone in Sri Lanka's history.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Yangon celebrates the 75th Anniversary of the Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Yangon celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence Day on February 3-4, 2023. The event included a cultural show and a diplomatic reception on February 3.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Tokyo celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Independence with a formal ceremony at Reiyukai Kotani Hall on 04 February 2023. The event was attended by high-level dignitaries to mark this significant milestone.

Title: Step towards Ethno-cultural Harmony in France
Summary: In Bondy, France, L'Association Liens et Cultures held the graduation of their Language Training Programme on January 28, 2023. The ceremony was attended by 150 students, mainly from the Tamil community, marking a step towards ethno-cultural harmony in the region.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka, Washington D.C. Commemorates 75th National Independence Day
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. celebrated the 75th National Independence Day on February 4, 2023, with Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe presiding over the event. The commemoration followed traditional customs and ceremonies, honoring the milestone in Sri Lanka's history.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan Celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jordan celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Independence on 4 February 2023 with staff and their family members. The event began with the hoisting of the national flag by Ambassador [insert name]. It was a joyous occasion marking a significant milestone in Sri Lanka's history.

Title: Seventy Fifth Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka Celebrated in Melbourne
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Melbourne, in collaboration with the local Sri Lankan community, hosted a grand ceremony to celebrate Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day. The event was attended by representatives of the government and prominent community members, marking a significant milestone for the Sri Lankan diaspora in Melbourne.

Title: Sri Lanka Mission in New York celebrates 75th anniversary of the Independence Day
Summary: The Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in New York celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day anniversary, led by Ambassador Mohan Pieris, the Permanent Representative of Sri Lanka to the United Nations.

Title: Sri Lanka’s 75th Anniversary of Independence celebrated in Seoul
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in the Republic of Korea, along with the Sri Lankan community, celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence in Seoul on February 4, 2023. The event marked a significant milestone in the country's history.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Beijing Celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Beijing marked the 75th Anniversary of Independence with a ceremony attended by the Sri Lankan community, embassy staff, and their families on February 4, 2023. The event celebrated this significant milestone in a vibrant and inclusive gathering.

Title: Sri Lanka’s 75th Independence Day commemorated in Brussels
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Belgium marked Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day in Brussels at the Ambassador's official residence, with the Sri Lankan community in Belgium participating on February 4th. The event celebrated the milestone with a gathering of the Sri Lankan community in Belgium.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Ethiopia celebrates 75th Anniversary of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's independence on February 4, 2023. The event took place at the Embassy premises with the participation of the Sri Lankan community.

Title: Celebration of the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka in Manila
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in the Philippines celebrated the 75th Independence Day of Sri Lanka in Manila on 4 February 2023. The event began with the hoisting of the national flag, followed by other commemorative activities. It was a significant occasion marking Sri Lanka's independence milestone.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain celebrates the 75th Anniversary of Independence Day of Sri Lanka
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Bahrain marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence Day on February 4, 2023, with a celebration at the Embassy premises attended by over 150 members of the Sri Lankan community. The event commemorated this significant milestone with enthusiasm and participation from the community.

Title: Ambassador Asirwatham meets the Secretary-General of Foreign Affairs of Luxembourg
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Belgium and Luxembourg, Grace Asirwatham, met with the Secretary-General of the Ministry of Foreign and European Affairs of Luxembourg, Jean Olinger, on January 15. The meeting aimed to discuss bilateral relations and cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Celebration of 75th Anniversary of Independence Day of Sri Lanka in Ankara
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Ankara celebrated the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence Day on February 4, 2023, at the Embassy premises with the participation of the Sri Lankan community. The event marked a significant milestone in the history of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.

Title: Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai hosts Post Graduate students and Faculty from Indian Institute of Democratic Leadership for an interactive session
Summary: On January 24, 2023, Dr. Valsan Vethody, the Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai, hosted an interactive session for 31 postgraduate students and 6 faculty members from the Indian Institute of Democratic Leadership (IIDL). The session aimed to facilitate dialogue and exchange between the consulate and the academic community, fostering mutual understanding and collaboration.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon celebrates 75th Independence Day
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Lebanon celebrated Sri Lanka's 75th Independence Day with an event at the Embassy premises in Beirut on February 5, 2023. The national anthem was performed in both Sinhala and Tamil during the celebration.

Title: Ambassador-designate Kapila Jayaweera calls on the Lebanese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Emigrants
Summary: Ambassador-designate Kapila Jayaweera of Sri Lanka met with Lebanese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Emigrants Abdullah Bou Habib on February 1 at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Lebanon.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador-designate to Germany Assumes Duties
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador-designate to Germany, Varuni Muthukumarana, has officially started her duties at the Sri Lanka Embassy in Berlin on 02 February 2023. She is a member of the Sri Lanka Foreign Service 2000 batch.

Title: 75th Anniversary of Independence of Sri Lanka commemorated in Dhaka
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Dhaka marked the 75th Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence on Saturday, 04 February 2023, with the Sri Lankan community in Bangladesh. The ceremony was attended by members of the Sri Lankan community in Bangladesh.

Title: Ban ki-Moon, former UN Secretary General and Chair of the Global Green Growth Institute discusses cooperation with Sri Lanka’s Ambassador to Korea
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the Republic of Korea, Savitri Panabokke, discussed cooperation with former UN Secretary General and President of the Global Green Growth Institute, Ban Ki-Moon, on February 1, 2023, at the Ban Ki-Moon Foundation.

Title: Sri Lanka High Commission in Kenya plants 100,000 trees and mobilizes 1,000,000 more to commemorate Sri Lanka’s 75th Anniversary  of Independence
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Kenya, led by High Commissioner Veluppillai Kananathan, planted 100,000 trees on January 31, 2023, at the Export Processing Zone in Nairobi to mark Sri Lanka's 75th Anniversary of Independence. Additionally, they aim to mobilize 1,000,000 more trees as part of the commemorative efforts.

Title: Donation of USD 17,550 to Sri Lanka by Aggamaha Saddhamma Jotika Dhaja,  Most Venerable Aung Za Bu Sayadaw, Chief of Aung Za Bu Monastery of Myanmar
Summary: Aggamaha Saddhamma Jotika Dhaja, Most Venerable Aung Za Bu Sayadaw, Chief of Aung Za Bu Monastery in Myanmar, donated USD 17,550 (approx. LKR 6,521,580) to the Government of Sri Lanka for purchasing essential medicines.

Title: Consular Mobile Service held in Catania, Sicily Island
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Italy conducted a Consular Mobile Service in Catania, Sicily Island on January 21 and 22, 2023. The service aimed to provide consular assistance to the Sri Lankan community living on the island.

Title: Sri Lanka concludes Fourth Universal Periodic Review (UPR) of the UN Human Rights Council, UPR Working Group, Geneva
Summary: Sri Lanka completed its Fourth Cycle of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) at the 42nd Session of the UPR Working Group in Geneva on February 1st. The country's National Report for the review was prepared by the Ministry.

Title: Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to the Kingdom of Bahrain Reethisri Wijeratne Mendis Assumes Duties
Summary: Reethisri Wijeratne Mendis has officially started her role as the new Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to the Kingdom of Bahrain. She assumed her duties at the Embassy of Sri Lanka on January 30, 2023.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets External Affairs Minister of India to review the status of bilateral relations
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's External Affairs Minister, Dr. S. Jaishankar, on January 31, 2023, in New Delhi. The meeting aimed to review the current status of bilateral relations between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador – designate to the Republic of Indonesia, Jayanath Colombage assumes duties
Summary: Ambassador-designate Jayanath Colombage has officially started his duties at the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Jakarta as the new Ambassador to the Republic of Indonesia. He assumed his role on January 30, 2023, marking the beginning of his diplomatic mission.

Title: Dhaka Chamber of Commerce and Industry discusses economic cooperation with Sri Lanka High Commission
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commissioner in Bangladesh, Prof. Sudharshan Seneviratne, along with First Secretary/Commerce Srimali Jayarathne, met with the newly appointed President of the Dhaka Chamber of Commerce and Industry to discuss economic cooperation.

Title: Sri Lanka participates at the FITUR International Travel Mart in Madrid, Spain
Summary: Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB) took part in the 42nd edition of FITUR International Travel Mart in Madrid, Spain from 18-22. The exhibition is a prominent global event in the travel industry. Sri Lanka successfully showcased its tourism offerings at the event.

Title: Saemaul Undong President pledges assistance to Sri Lanka  for Rural Development
Summary: Saemaul Undong Foundation President Lee Seung-Jong met with Sri Lankan Ambassador Savitri Panabokke on January 27, 2023, at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Seoul. They discussed plans to provide assistance for rural development in Sri Lanka.

Title: High Commissioner Moragoda meets the Indian Chief of Defence Staff
Summary: Sri Lanka’s High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with Indian Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan on 27 January at the Ministry of Defence in New Delhi. The meeting was cordial and aimed at discussing bilateral defense cooperation between the two countries.

Title: Almsgiving held at the Consulate General of Milan
Summary: An almsgiving event was held at the Consulate General of Milan on 21 January 2023, following the assumption of duties by the new Consul General Dilani Weerakoon on 11 January 2023. The event was organized to invoke blessings.

Title: “Destination Sri Lanka in Nowruz Season-2023”  Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran conducts Tourism Facilitation Event
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Tehran, in partnership with various tourism organizations, hosted a tourism facilitation event for the Nowruz Season 2023. The event aimed to promote Sri Lanka as a travel destination and enhance tourism opportunities between Iran and Sri Lanka.

Title: Ambassador-designate to the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekara Assumes Duties
Summary: J.A.D.S. Priyangika Wijegunasekera has started her role as the Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Jordan, commencing duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Jordan on January 23, 2023. Her arrival marks the official beginning of her diplomatic responsibilities in representing Sri Lanka in the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
