Title: Ambassador E Rodney M. Perera Presents Credentials to the Emperor of Japan
Summary: Ambassador E. Rodney M. Perera, the newly appointed Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Japan, presented his Letters of Credence to His Majesty Naruhito at the Imperial Palace in Tokyo on 19 January 2023. The Credentials Presentation Ceremony marked the official beginning of his diplomatic mission in Japan.

Title: The First Consular Mobile Service of the year 2023 in Scarborough
Summary: The Consulate General of Sri Lanka in Toronto organized its first consular mobile service of 2023 in Scarborough on Saturday, 7 January. This service is part of the Consulate General's monthly outreach efforts to provide consular assistance to the community.

Title: Honorary Consul for Sri Lanka in Gaziantep calls on Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye
Summary: Honorary Consul for Sri Lanka in Gaziantep, Süleyman Çicek, recently met with Ambassador Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake. Gaziantep, located in the South-Eastern Anatolian Region, is a modern province. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, calls on the Governor of Istanbul, Türkiye
Summary: Ambassador Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake met with Governor Ali Yerlikaya and Deputy Governor Ozlem Bozkurt Gevrek in Istanbul, Türkiye. During the meeting, she highlighted Sri Lanka's longstanding relationship with Türkiye, which originated with the appointment of an Honorary Consul.

Title: Thai Pongal celebrations at the High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore
Summary: The Thai Pongal festival was celebrated at the Sri Lanka High Commission in Singapore by the Sri Lankan community for the third consecutive year. The colorful ceremony marked the occasion with festivities and cultural significance.

Title: China lists Sri Lanka in its pilot programme for outbound tourism
Summary: China's Ministry of Culture and Tourism announced on January 20, 2023, that Sri Lanka will be part of its outbound tourism pilot program starting February 6, 2023. This inclusion signifies a significant step in promoting tourism between the two countries.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Ambassador – designate to Ethiopia assumes duties
Summary: Sri Lanka's Ambassador-designate to Ethiopia, K.K. Theshantha Kumarasiri, officially started his duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Addis Ababa on January 18, 2023. He addressed the Embassy staff upon assuming his new role.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Rome celebrates Thai Pongal
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Rome celebrated Thai Pongal on 18 January 2023 at its premises. Thai Pongal is the Harvest Festival symbolizing productivity, prosperity, and happiness. The event highlighted the cultural significance of the festival.

Title: Sri Lanka – United Kingdom Chamber of Commerce holds the first Annual General Meeting
Summary: The Sri Lanka-UK Chamber of Commerce conducted its inaugural Annual General Meeting at the Sri Lanka High Commission in London on January 12, 2023, with the presence of the High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to the United Kingdom, Saroj.

Title: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye, Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, visits Middle East Technical University
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye, S. Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, recently visited Middle East Technical University (METU) to explore potential collaborations in the field of archaeology. The visit aimed to strengthen ties and foster cooperation between the two countries in this area.

Title: Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai Celebrates Thai Pongal
Summary: The Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in Chennai celebrated Thai Pongal on January 13, 2023, by boiling milk in a clay pot and preparing sweet Pongal. The day included a special puja to invoke happiness and prosperity, held at the Chancery premises.

Title: Embassy of Sri Lanka in Vienna distributes Tourism Promotion calendars
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Vienna, in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB), has created and distributed Tourism Promotion calendars for 2023. The calendars aim to showcase Sri Lanka as a tourist destination in Austria.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye calls on the Governor of Ankara
Summary: The Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Türkiye, S. Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, recently met with the Governor of Ankara, Vasip Şahin, to discuss enhancing bilateral relations. The meeting was productive and focused on strengthening ties between the two countries.

Title: Ambassador Lakshitha Ratnayake presents Letters of Credence in Venezuela
Summary: Ambassador Lakshitha Ratnayake, representing Sri Lanka in Cuba and Venezuela, presented his Letters of Credence to President Nicolás Maduro Moros of Venezuela.

Title: High Commissioner Milinda Moragoda discusses priority areas for cooperation with India’s National Security Advisor
Summary: Sri Lanka's High Commissioner to India, Milinda Moragoda, met with India's National Security Advisor, Shri Ajit Kumar Doval, on January 16. They discussed priority areas for cooperation between India and Sri Lanka, focusing on enhancing bilateral relations.

Title: Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai attends the Dhara Event as a Guest of Honor and Speaker
Summary: The Consul General of Sri Lanka in Mumbai attended the Dhara Event as a Guest of Honor and Speaker, highlighting India's cultural connections and relations with South East Asia. The event was organized by the Indian Knowledge Systems (IKS) Division of the Ministry of Education at the All India Council for Technical Education.

Title: Ombudsmen of Sri Lanka & Türkiye signs bilateral cooperation MoU in Ankara
Summary: During the International Ombudsman Conference 2023 in Ankara, the Ombudsman of Sri Lanka and the Ombudsman Institution of Türkiye signed a bilateral cooperation Memorandum of Understanding. The agreement aims to enhance collaboration between the two offices for better governance and accountability.

Title: Ambassador-designate to the United Arab Emirates, Udaya Indrarathna Assumes Duties
Summary: Udaya Indrarathna, the Ambassador-designate of Sri Lanka to the United Arab Emirates, officially started his duties at the Sri Lankan Embassy in Abu Dhabi on January 6, 2023. Ambassador Udaya arrived at the Embassy in Abu Dhabi to assume his new role.

Title: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore commences work for the  Year 2023
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Singapore started its work for the Year 2023 with a Pirith chanting ceremony organized by the staff on 2 January. The ceremony took place at the Chancery and was attended by Ven. Mon.

Title: ​​French collaboration for capacity building in the Sri Lankan Rubber industry
Summary: The Ministry of Plantation Industries of Sri Lanka has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with French rubber industry expert KSAPA to enhance the capacity of Rubber Smallholders in Sri Lanka. This collaboration aims to strengthen the Sri Lankan rubber industry through knowledge sharing and skill development.

Title: Publicity campaign to Promote Sri Lanka in Latin America
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Brazil is running a publicity campaign to promote Sri Lanka in Latin America. As part of this effort, Ambassador Sumith Dassanayake had a TV interview to raise awareness about the country.

Title: ICTA seeks to enhance cooperation with Bangladesh ICT Sector
Summary: The High Commission of Sri Lanka in Dhaka recently held a virtual meeting to enhance cooperation between the Information Communication Technology Agency (ICTA) in Sri Lanka and the Bangladesh Association of Software and Inform. The meeting aimed to strengthen ties between the two countries' ICT sectors.

Title: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to the State of Kuwait pays farewell call on the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Kuwait
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka to Kuwait, U. L. Mohammed Jauhar, bid farewell to Kuwait's Foreign Minister Sheikh Salem Abdullah Al-Jaber Al-Sabah on December 29, 2022, at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Title: Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Vienna commenced work for 2023
Summary: The Embassy and Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka in Vienna began its activities for 2023 with a ceremony at the Embassy premises, including hoisting the National Flag and singing the National Anthem. The event marked the official start of their work for the year.

Title: Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka to the United Nations in New York commences work for 2023
Summary: The staff of the Permanent Mission of Sri Lanka to the United Nations in New York began their work for 2023 on Monday, January 2nd, with a brief ceremony at the Mission premises. The ceremony marked the official commencement of activities for the new year.

Title: 550 new USA Job Opportunities for Sri Lankans
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C., in partnership with the Sri Lanka Foreign Employment Agency (SLFEA), has successfully secured 550 job opportunities in the United States for Sri Lankans. This initiative provides new employment prospects for individuals from Sri Lanka looking to work in the USA.

Title: Commencement of work for the Year 2023- Sri Lanka High Commission in Ottawa
Summary: The Sri Lanka High Commission in Ottawa started its operations for 2023 with a ceremony at its premises on January 2nd. The event began with the hoisting of the National Flag.

Title: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C commences work for the Year 2023
Summary: The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Washington D.C. started its operations for 2023 on January 2, with Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe leading the commencement. The first day included the traditional hoisting of the flag, marking the beginning of the new year's work.

Title: Special Assistant to the US President and Senior Director for South Asia, Rear Admiral Eileen Laubacher met with Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe
Summary: Special Assistant to the US President and Senior Director for South Asia, Rear Admiral Eileen Laubacher, met with Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe at the Embassy premises on December 28, 2022. The meeting took place to discuss matters concerning South Asia.

Title: Wreath-Laying Ceremony at Anıtkabir Mausoleum by the Ambassador of Sri Lanka
Summary: Ambassador of Sri Lanka, S. Hasanthi Urugodawatte Dissanayake, participated in a Wreath-Laying Ceremony at Anıtkabir Mausoleum following the presentation of Letters of Credence to the President of the Republic of Türkiye. The ceremony was a symbolic gesture of respect and honor.

Title: Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington D.C. Celebrates Christmas 2022
Summary: The Sri Lanka Embassy in Washington D.C. celebrated Christmas on December 17, 2022, at the chancery premises, with the event streamed live on Zoom and Facebook. Ambassador Mahinda Samarasinghe extended his seasonal greetings during the celebration.
